name: Radius
dialog: First, here's some basic advice on attacking, so listen up young'un...! You know that the three different attack levels -- Weak, Strong, and Fierce -- each have differing accuracy, or \'\HIT%\'\ values, don't you? Every time you hit your opponent, each of these values increase to make it easier for your next attack to hit its mark! A good strategy is to start with Weak(1) blows, which have the highest chance of succeeding, and then build up to Strong(2) and Fierce(3) blows. So, rather than attacking willy-nilly, you should aim to build up your HIT%. If your Fierce(3) attacks don't hit home, you're just wasting your energy! Weak! Strong!! Fierce!!!

name: Radius
dialog: Hoh-hoh-hoh! You're not even close! Don't be trusting in your HIT% too much there, boy! As long as it's not 100%, you still run the risk of missing continuously, don't you!? Sometimes it pays to muster up the courage to use Strong(2) and Fierce(3) attacks straight from the start, too! Fierce! Fierce!!

name: Radius
dialog: Next, let's check out the use of Elements! When you use an Element, the color of that Element's attribute remains on the battlefield in the form of the \'\Field Effect!\'\ Each time you consecutively use the same-colored Elements, the effectiveness of that colored Element group increases! Here, I'll show you... Let's fill up all the Field Effect attributes with the color blue! Try using a blue Element after me...

name: Radius
dialog: See! The field is completely blue now. Any blue Elements you use now will sure pack a punch! Here! Try this out...

name: Radius
dialog: Hey there! Hurry up and turn all the Field Effect attributes blue, for crying out loud! Don't you know how to use them Elements or something, young'un? If that's the case, then listen up, boy! It takes some explaining!

name: Radius
dialog: First, you've got to choose \'\Attack\'\ to do some physical damage to your opponent in order to get started! Weak(1), Strong(2), and Fierce(3) attacks each add 1, 2, or 3 points to your Element Power Level. Your current level is the number that appears above the \'\Lv\'\ symbol under your name there, son! Oh, I nearly forgot to tell you! You won't accumulate any power unless you actually succeed in hitting your opponent... So be careful! You can't afford to miss!

name: Radius
dialog: Discharging this accumulated power is what using Elements is all about! Once you've built up some power, you will be able to choose the \'\Element\'\ option from the battle menu. When you select the Element option, gray-colored rectangular plates appear on the screen, don't they? Those plates are the Elements you currently have allocated.

name: Radius
dialog: So...why don't you try using one of those blue Elements you have there, boy? Relax! They won't disappear when you use them... You just won't be able to use them again for the rest of this battle, that's all! Once you enter another battle, you'll be able to use them again. So don't hold back now... But even though I say this, I still have to stress that you've got to consider the appropriate time to use your Elements. Otherwise, you'll never be able to beat some of the harder enemies you're bound to meet! You've got to form the proper strategy, boy!

name: Radius
dialog: Oh, but wait! I'm forgetting something important... (It must be my old age!) There are some Elements that disappear in a puff of smoke each time you use them! The Element \'\Tablet\'\ is just one example! These are called \'\Consumable Elements,\'\ and they have the symbol \'\\Object\\'\ in front of their names. These don't regenerate after each battle. However, the benefit of such Consumable Elements is that you can allocate up to five of these into the same Element Grid space. Doing so allows you to use several of them in the same battle, unlike Basic Elements, which normally can only be used once in any one battle. That is why Consumable Elements also have a number such as \'\x5\'\ after their names. That's the number you currently hold in that Grid position. This number will decrease as the Elements are used up for good. However, after each battle, you can restock more for use next time.

name: Radius
dialog: Anyway, enough about that. More about actually using Elements... I'm sure you'll notice that each time you use an Element, your Element Power Level (as shown by the \'\Lv\'\ number) will go down. It's just simple subtraction, really! For instance, say you're currently at \'\Lv 3\'\ and you decide to use a \Tablet\'\ Element allocated at \Lv 1\ in your Element Grid! In this case 3 minus 1 leaves 2. So your current Element Power Level will now be changed to \'\Lv 2\'\! You can use Elements anytime, so long as your Stamina value is above 1.0. So in this case, you'll still be able to use Elements with a Power Level of up to Lv 2 right after using the Tablet Element!

name: Radius
dialog: Did you get the gist of it, sonny? Now do you see the importance of developing good battle tactics? You could build up a little power, then use an Element, build up a little more power, then use another Element... repeating this over and over. That's OK! Or you can build up your Element Power to its maximum level and unleash a barrage of Elements, one after another. That's no problem either! Use whatever strategy you think will work to defeat each of the enemies you come across. It's up to you. There are hordes of monsters out there that you'll never be able to defeat by physical attacks alone! You're going to need to master Elements to get by, boy. Well, sorry for the long lecture there, sonny. My explanation about Elements is officially over... Why don't you try and use one now?

name: Radius
dialog: Hoh-hoh-hoh! Was that too much for you? Sorry about that, young'un! Conversely, when there is a lot of blue in the Field Effect attributes, the Elements of the opposite color, red, will be weakened! So try to discern your enemy's attack pattern and fill the Field with the opposite color of his attacks as a form of defense. This strategy of using Elements is sure to come in handy, so put it to good use, sonny!

name: Korcha
dialog: Hey, Doc, let's not think too deeply about this. There isn't any easy way to explain it. Even after going through it myself, I still doubt what I saw. Let's just drop the theories, Doc! The girl's been saved. That's all we need to know, right?

name: Doc
dialog: Well, I guess you are right... I cannot find an answer to this by thinking about it on my own.

name: Doc
dialog: It is pretty late. We have been talking for quite some time... Let's call it a night. One good day's rest should be enough to let her get up and hang ten.

name: Kid
dialog: Whatcha gonna do, Serge? You've already found a way back to your own world, right? You could just go back home and live a peaceful life, pretending that nothin' ever happened. But can ya really forget everything you've seen here? And can ya live with yerself after ya turned yer back on us?

name: Kid
dialog: What are ya gonna do, Serge? ~~~Go back home ~~~I won't go back yet

name: Member
dialog: Serge, are you sure you're going to be satisfied with that?

name: Member
dialog: Think about it, Serge! Why did you take the trouble to cross the worlds to help Kid? It wasn't just because you wanted to go back to your world, right? You had other reasons to come back to this world!

name: Kid
dialog: I see... Then I'll stick around with ya a little longer. But just don't slow me down, ya hear?

name: Kid
dialog: I don't know what happened 10 years ago... But it looks like Viper's mob has got something to do with it. Let's go after 'em. I need to go bash up that Lynx character and get me hands on the Frozen Flame!

name: Kid
dialog: Lynx... He stole something precious from me... He's taken away my future...! I'll find him! No matter what it takes!

name: Kid
dialog: Korcha, I heard that ya helped in the search, too.

name: Korcha
dialog: Hmph. It was nothing.

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah? Well, thanks for nothin' then...

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Now then.

name: Korcha
dialog: At one point I thought we were doomed for sure, but it looks like it's all settled now.

name: Korcha
dialog: All that's left is to take you guys back to Termina, right? My job ends there. You get a special discount price of 300G for the round trip. Sorry, but I need to make a livin' too.

name: Kid
dialog: Haha, you're pretty damn shrewd, eh? I shouldn't have thanked ya earlier. Hmm?

name: Korcha
dialog: What is it? Ya lookin' for something?

name: Kid
dialog: ...Hmm, yeah. Well, the Elements I had on me Grid are gone.

name: Kid
dialog: Oi, Serge. Didja remove the Elements from me Grid?

name: Kid
dialog: Hmm, if it wasn't you... then who did?

name: Korcha
dialog: The only ones looking over you while we were gone were the doc and the nurse. They should be in the room next door, so let's ask them when we head out. The doc should know something.

name: Kid
dialog: ...... I hope you're right.

name: Korcha
dialog: Huh? Mel, whatCHA doin'...

name: Korcha
dialog: Mel, wai...

name: Doc
dialog: What is it, dude? Is Mel up to something again?

name: Korcha
dialog: Well, yeah. The same old mischief, but... This time, she's gone too far.

name: Korcha
dialog: Geez, that idiot... What is she thinkin'? I don't get it. I'm sorry about her, Kid. I'll get the stuff back from her later, so go easy on her, alright?

name: Kid
dialog: Ahh, that's no problem. It ain't anythin' I'll suffer without anyway. Not to be rude, but I don't have time to play around with brats. I've gotta go chase after Lynx, now!

name: Kid
dialog: Hmm, what is it, Serge? ~~~You need those Elements ~~~...It's nothing

name: Kid
dialog: ...Well, you're not wrong! But Korcha said that he'd get them back later. We don't have time to waste. Ain't that right, Serge? C'mon, mate, let's go. ~~~...Alright, let's go ~~~No, let's go after Mel

name: Kid
dialog: Why are you actin' so strange? Just when I thought you'd loosened up a little... Don't worry. Korcha said he'd get back me stolen stuff later. Let's just get a move on!

name: Kid
dialog: Ahh, alright. If ya insist. OK, then let's go find that brat right away. Time ain't gonna wait for us!

name: Kid
dialog: That's the plan, Korcha. Why don't ya help us out a bit. It'll be over a lot quicker that way.

name: Korcha
dialog: GotCHA!

name: Doc
dialog: Hmm, I am beginning to wonder if curing you was the right course of action. Such a ruckus in the clinic interferes with my work... But I guess your antics are proof of your youth, dude!

name: Korcha
dialog: Don'tCHA worry, Serge.. Leave the rest up to me. I'll go grab that kid after I take you guys back to Termina. I won't make you guys wait long.

name: Doc
dialog: I have caused much trouble for you dudes with this incident. It is embarassing, as a doctor. I assume you are going to continue your journey? Try not to take too many risks. One must live strongly because life is limited!

name: Korcha
dialog: Well, it's nothing big; if she isn't here, that's OK.

name: Man
dialog: Chief Direa is in prayer. You may not enter the shrine now, come back a little later. It shouldn't be that long. ...Hmm, what brings you here, Korcha? It's rare to see you come out to this tower.

name: Korcha
dialog: Oh, never mind that. By the way, have you seen Mel around here? We're lookin' for her right now.

name: Man
dialog: ...Mel? No, I haven't seen her today. Have you tried the residential tower?

name: Korcha
dialog: So, she hasn't come this way... Thanks for the info!

name: Korcha
dialog: As you've just heard, she hasn't come this way. The only place left is the residential tower. The sea is the only other place to hide, but that's not likely. Once we corner her, it's all over. Let's go!

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Huh?

name: Korcha
dialog: Mel's heading for the residential tower! We've got her cornered now. OK, let's go! We should find her in no time.

name: Korcha
dialog: This is the end. There's no place to run.

name: Kid
dialog: So, what're we gonna do? If all three of us barge in at once, she's gonna escape.

name: Korcha
dialog: There are three exits to this tower. If we each go in through a different exit, there's no escape.

name: Korcha
dialog: Listen up. Don'tCHA dare let Mel get outside!

name: Korcha
dialog: Yup, I'm countin' on ya!

name: Korcha
dialog: Now, there are two more left. We'll even end up with some manpower to spare. It's game over, Mel.

name: Korcha
dialog: Let's do it!

name: Korcha
dialog: You idiot. That's whatCHA get for messin' with my customers! I'm not gonna forgive you just for cryin'!

name: Kid
dialog: That should be enough. We've got me stuff back, and there's been no harm done.

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Even so, we have to teach this kid some proper manners. You never know when she might do it again!

name: Kid
dialog: Don't worry about such minor stuff. I say it's already forgiven... Let's just leave it at that.

name: Kid
dialog: Besides... The little 'un's got some guts to steal from a member of the Radical Dreamers! Hahaha!!!

name: Kid
dialog: Oooh, how feisty...!? So she's got real spirit, too! But weren't ya cryin' just now? Or were ya just fakin' it? I tell ya... She's gonna be a real mean one when she grows up! Hahaha!

name: Kid
dialog: Whoops! I guess you're still just a little 'un. Don't worry, just forget it!

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Hey, are you sure you want to leave it at that? I just don't getCHA. Oh well, no use botherin' with it now.

name: Korcha
dialog: Then I'll go ahead and wait for you at the docks. Come and find me when you're ready to go.

name: Kid
dialog: Alright, let's get movin' then...

name: Korcha
dialog: You want to go back to Termina? ~~~Not yet ~~~Yep, back to Termina

name: Korcha
dialog: Take your time there's no rush. You probably won't be coming back here anytime soon anyway. I'll wait here for you until you're satisfied. Gimme a holler when you think you're ready to go.

name: Korcha
dialog: OK, let's go. Heh, it was nice knowing ya, but this is good-bye.

name: System
dialog: Korcha leftCHA party.

name: Korcha
dialog: I'll take care of getting back the stolen Elements, so don'tCHA worry. It was just a kid's prank, so go easy on her, alright? OK, then, come and find me when you're ready to go.

name: Korcha
dialog: Here we are in Termina. You're on your own from here.

name: Kid
dialog: Oi, Serge, didja hear that? When I was snoozin' away in Guldove, Lynx and his mob hightailed it out of the manor. That fort's supposedly a ruin built by the extinct Dragonians... I heard there've been all kinds of mystic rituals there. It's said that the Dragon Tear was needed for the rituals... Bloody bastards, what are they up to now? Serge., this is no longer just our problem. If we don't stop these buggers now, they're gonna cause some major hell around here!

name: Member
dialog: Fort Dragonia is on top of Mount Pyre, southeast of hear. It'll be hard to get there by land, so... the question now is how are we going to get a boat?

name: Glenn
dialog: Blonde braids... A blood red blouse... That sounds like the description of that thief from the Radical Dreamers...

name: Glenn
dialog: And that red bandana... He is just like the ghost Karsh was describing.

name: Kid
dialog: So what? Ya wanna take us on or somethin'? Sorry dorry, but we're in a bit of a rush.... to that Fort Dragonia of yers...

name: Glenn
dialog: What business do you have at the fort...? That makes me even more suspicious... I will draw my sword if needs be...

name: Woman
dialog: Oh, Glenn, stop that! Your brother would never have drawn a sword in such circumstances!

name: Glenn
dialog: Leave my brother out of this!

name: Kid
dialog: Oi, don't get yer knickers in a knot... I don't care if ya draw yer sword or what, but I ain't stoppin' for ya. See ya!

name: Glenn
dialog: All right. Forgive me for my rash behavior... Come to think of it, I really have no interest in who you are. Really, I only want to know the truth of what is happening here. I shall follow my own way to find the truth.

name: Glenn
dialog: If you intend to go to the fort, I would offer you a word of advice. When you get on your boat, first head north, and then east. You should find a small island there. A retired dragoon now lives there. Find him and ask for his advice. There are many frightful rumors about that fort, you know. You never know what to expect there.

name: Kid
dialog: All we need to do now is to find a boat! Let's git a move on it!

name: Korcha
dialog: You guys need to cross the sea? Then I might, just might, think about lending you my boat. With two conditions...

name: Kid
dialog: Ha, with that clunky boat of yers, I don't think we're gonna survive a round trip. But I guess this ain't the time to be picky. So, Korcha, what are yer conditions?

name: Korcha
dialog: First, if you ever find the Dragon Tear, give it to me.

name: Korcha
dialog: The other condition is... O-Once all this ruckus is over... Um... I wantCHA to... Mumble, mumble...

name: Kid
dialog: What was that? Stop mumblin' and speak up. I can't hear ya.

name: Korcha
dialog: I a... Arrgh... I wantCHA to be my wife!

name: Kid
dialog: Huh...? What...did you just say?

name: Korcha
dialog: I said, 'I WANTCHA TO BE MY WIFE!'

name: Kid
dialog: ...!!! Oi, Korcha!!! Don't mess with me! I'm gonna kick yer arse so hard you'll kiss the moons!

name: Korcha
dialog: I'm not joking! To tell you the truth, I, um... That it... It was... love at first sight...

name: Kid
dialog: Mmmnn...! Oi, ya know who I am, don't ya!?

name: Korcha
dialog: Yeah, you're some kind of thief, ain'tCHA? Don'tCHA worry. I don't care about your past, and I don't wantCHA to feel forced. We can wait until all this fuss is over. So, please...

name: Kid
dialog: Mmmghh...! ~~~Just tell him that you will ~~~Refuse

name: Kid
dialog: Serge, this is none of yer business. It's me own problem!

name: Kid
dialog: OK, understood! But this ain't somethin' I can agree to on a whim.

name: Kid
dialog: I'll consider it. Until I settle the score with Lynx, that is. That's about the best I can promise. I can't guarantee you anythin' more.

name: Korcha
dialog: Alright, that's all I need for now. OK, I'll lend you the boat.

name: Kid
dialog: Glenn, what was it you were sayin' earlier? Somethin' 'bout goin' to see an old man on a small island to the east...

name: Glenn
dialog: First, head north and then east by boat. There is a small island there. A retired dragoon named Radius lives on that island.

name: Kid
dialog: What was that Glenn guy sayin' earlier? Somethin' 'bout goin' to see an old man on a small island to the east...

name: Korcha
dialog: Hey, you be careful with yourself from now on. Just remember that your life is not just your own anymore. You're carrying my wife-to-be.

name: Kid
dialog: Brrrhh! (Goose bumps!!!)

name: Korcha
dialog: Do you want me to come with you? ~~~Take him with you ~~~Don't take him with you

name: Korcha
dialog: OK, then I'll be heading home now. Remember that I'm just LENDING you my boat! Don'tCHA dare sink it! Take care!

name: System
dialog: Korcha joinedCHA party!

name: Kid
dialog: ...... This is getting bloody crazy...

name: Kid
dialog: Looks like we got Korcha to lend us his boat.

name: Korcha
dialog: Hey, wait a minute! She's your partner, ain't she? Aren'tCHA gonna do anything? ~~~...There's nothing we can do ~~~I'll find a way to save her

name: Korcha
dialog: You scared me for a second... Heh, I've come this far, I'll tag along with ya!

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Hold it right there.

name: Korcha
dialog: You've got no right to keep that girl's amulet. Leave that thing here.

name: Korcha
dialog: What's wrong? Hurry it up.

name: System
dialog: Serge handed over the Astral Amulet.

name: Korcha
dialog: Tsk, this is disgustin'. ...It's turnin' out to be a baaad day.

name: Korcha
dialog: What do you want? Ya need something from me? I don't want nothing to do with you. Get outta here.

name: Korcha
dialog: You've got something to say? ~~~I need to borrow your boat ~~~......

name: Korcha
dialog: Ha, it's got nothing to do with me. You're distracting me by standing there. Will ya hurry up and get out of the room?

name: Korcha
dialog: Lend you my boat? Ha, no way! Why should I lend you my boat? Sorry, pal, go find someone else.

name: Macha
dialog: Hold it right there!!!

name: Korcha
dialog: M-M-Ma!!! Why are you here? You said you were goin' shoppin'!?

name: Korcha
dialog: O-Oh leave me alone! These guys ain't no friends of mine! In the first place, this has got nothing to do with you, ma. Why should I lend my boat to guys who abandon their own partners!?

name: Korcha
dialog: Ugh...um, well...

name: Korcha
dialog: S-Sorry about that... I just lost my temper.

name: Korcha
dialog: H-Hey, that's a completely different story, ma. I can't lend them my boat...

name: Korcha
dialog: You say a boat or two, but... That's the only one I have. Besides, I've got nothin' to do with...

name: Korcha
dialog: Oh gawd! You gotta be kiddin'...

name: Macha
dialog: I'll be waitin' at the docks. Call me when you're ready to leave the village. By the way, Serge.. You should go see the village shaman. You look like you are lost, and she might be able to help you get back on your path...

name: Macha
dialog: Alrighty.

name: Macha
dialog: Oops, I almost forgot. I came back to get some things I left behind.

name: Macha
dialog: OK, Serge.. I'll be waiting for you at the docks.

name: Macha
dialog: OK, Serge.. Call me when you're ready to go. This isn't anything special, but go ahead and keep it. You know what frames are, right? This frame is called 'Tropical Paradise.'

name: Korcha
dialog: Don't get me wrong! I'm only lending you the boat because ma said to.

name: Macha
dialog: Serge, you haven't met the shaman yet? Oops... Sorry about that. I forgot to tell you where she is. All you need to do, is go straight down this way, get to the second floor and keep going left. That leads you down to the Dragon Shrine.

name: Macha
dialog: Are you ready? ~~~Not yet ~~~Ready

name: Macha
dialog: Is that so? Well, there's no rush. Just take your time.

name: Macha
dialog: OK then, let's get going. Alright boys and girls, all of you get on the boat!

name: Macha
dialog: Hmm? You got a problem with that? Ya don't see any other boats needin' to dock, do you?

name: Macha
dialog: Ah, cut the jive-talk!!!

name: Macha
dialog: OK, we're in Termina. Do whatCHA need to do!

name: Glenn
dialog: The general and his men are headed for Fort Dragonia. There has been word that the major power of the East, Porre, is up to something suspicious. They seem to have heard the rumors of the Frozen Flame in El Nido and are coming to investigate.

name: Woman
dialog: My, then that means the Porre army might invade this town any time now. I wonder if we will be alright...

name: Glenn
dialog: Yes, that is why we are moving to the fort for a while. That fort is far from town so it is not used normally, but it has good defenses. I was ordered to remain at the manor and protect Miss Riddel, but... She felt very uneasy about the way General Viper was acting before he left, so...

name: Woman
dialog: What are you going to do? Aren't you going to get in trouble if you leave the manor?

name: Glenn
dialog: Yes... Still, I cannot stop thinking about it, so I am planning to infiltrate the fort by boat.

name: Woman
dialog: Are you sure about that? If worse comes to worst, you might be discharged from the Acacia Dragoons.

name: Glenn
dialog: Yes. I will act in accordance with my faith, even if I have to break military regulations. I must go. Ma'am, I will come back to buy flowers from you when I return!

name: Woman
dialog: Take care!

name: Macha
dialog: I'm gonna head home soon, but whatCHA gonna do now? I don't know what happened ten years ago or what's goin' on now, but don'tCHA wanna get things straight? Or do you just wanna go live somewhere in peace and quiet? ~~~Straighten things out ~~~Live quietly

name: Macha
dialog: Hmm, well if you say so. There's nothing more for me to say about it. You don't have to make some epic journey to find happiness. But this ol' lady thinks you should have a little more adventure when you're young. You sure you wanna stop here? ~~~No, I'll set things straight! ~~~Yes, I'll live on quietly

name: Macha
dialog: That a boy! I knew you wouldn't give up! Life is a journey to find yourself. That's how everyone grows up... So, where do we go to find out what's goin' on? What? So you say we need to go after Lynx and General Viper to Fort Dragonia?

name: Macha
dialog: Did you hear? Fort Dragonia is a ruin of the extinct Dragonians... People say they conducted strange ceremonies, and most folks from Guldove won't go near the place... You gotta wonder what they're up to with the Dragon Tear there. It gives me the chills. Also, you've got to go through Mount Pyre to get to that fort. You're gonna need to get there by boat... ~!!!~

name: Macha
dialog: I know! You can borrow this boat. Just a little farewell gift from me. Don't worry! That brat son o' mine's not gonna use it for anythin' good anyway!

name: System
dialog: Serge borrowed the boat from Macha!

name: Glenn
dialog: I need to borrow a boat...

name: Macha
dialog: Oops, you are just a tad too late. I just lent this boat to someone else. Ask this boy here.

name: Glenn
dialog: I need to borrow a boat... I am trying to get to Fort Dragonia.

name: Macha
dialog: Fort Dragonia!? Wow, what a coincidence! These boys have some business there, too!

name: Glenn
dialog: You are... You are the young man that gave us the bellflower... Thank you again. Miss Riddel greatly appreciated your kindness.

name: Macha
dialog: You two already know each other? What great timing! On the road you need a companion, in life you need kindness. Join in with them on their trip to the fort.

name: Glenn
dialog: But what business brings you to Fort Dragonia...? And that red bandana... It all seems similar to some ghost Karsh was telling me about.

name: Macha
dialog: Ahh, you city-folk try to make things too complicated! That's got nothin' to do with you, right? This poor boy's got his own problems, too!!! Why don'tCHA ask him his story to pass time while you're travelling?

name: Glenn
dialog: Uh, y-yes... I guess you are right.

name: Glenn
dialog: So what will it be? ~~~Let him join ~~~Don't let him join

name: Glenn
dialog: Thank you... I have a suggestion before heading to the fort. When we get on the boat, first head north and then east. You should find a small island there. A retired Master Knight of the Dragoons named Radius lives there now. When me and my big brother were young, he used to look after us quite often. We should go ask for his advice before going any further. There are many frightful rumors about that fort. Who knows what to expect there.

name: Macha
dialog: Serge.!!! Why are you tryin' to leave this poor boy out? Don'tCHA need all the help you can get right now? I mean, he even looks like a knight! Be a good boy, and take him with you!

name: Glenn
dialog: Thank you... I have a suggestion before heading to the fort. When we get on the boat, first head north and then east. You should find a small island there. A retired Master Knight of the Dragoons named Radius lives there now. When me and my big brother were young, he used to look after us quite often. We should go ask for his advice before going any further. There are many frightful rumors about that fort. Who knows what to expect there.

name: System
dialog: Glenn joined your party!

name: Macha
dialog: I'm a little worried about you... Do you want me to come along? ~~~Let her join ~~~No, thanks

name: System
dialog: Macha joinedCHA party!

name: Macha
dialog: Then I'll be headin' home. That mischievous son of mine's probably starving back home. Be careful out there. If you ever need something, stop by Guldove again!

name: Woman
dialog: Just remember, Glenn, don't push yourself too hard. If you die, you'll never accomplish all those things you want to do.

name: System
dialog: Guile received Bronze Rod!

name: Nikki
dialog: I'll be gone for a while... But don't worry. I'll be back when the gig's over.

name: Nikki
dialog: I'll be gone for a while... Don't worry, man. I'll definitely come back when the gig's over.

name: Glenn
dialog: ...... Now...this brings back some memories.

name: Riddel
dialog: Looks like Dario took the championship after all.

name: Karsh
dialog: Ha! I almost had ya there, though. It won't be the same next year, Dario. Next time, I'll take the trophy!

name: Dario
dialog: Haha, good luck, Karsh.

name: Karsh
dialog: What caught me by surprise this time was Glenn. Since when did he improve his skills so much? We've got to watch out for him next time. Ain't I right, Glenn?

name: Karsh
dialog: Glenn? Waddaya doing?

name: Glenn
dialog: Oh, uh n-nothing! But wow, both Dario and Karsh are great! Compared to that, I've still got a long way to go to win.

name: Karsh
dialog: Weird kid... Don't worry. You'll be celebrating with the winner's trophy in no time!

name: Karsh
dialog: Well, maybe not while I'm still around, though!!! Hahaha!

name: Riddel
dialog: What's with this big mouth of yours! Glenn, pay him no heed. Don't hold back!

name: Karsh
dialog: Ah, come on. Lady Riddel is always on the brothers' side! Will ya come and be on my side once in a while?

name: Riddel
dialog: Oh, but that's not true. I'm always cheering for the three of you. As long as you're all safe, I'm content. As long as it is peaceful, and we can all talk together like this... I wish that it would always be this way. That is my most deepest wish...

name: Glenn
dialog: Oops... Now is not the time to get sentimental...

name: Girl
dialog: Mr. Glenn! Can you help me? These two just won't stop fighting. Mr. Glenn, when you used to live here, you didn't fight, did you? Please, tell them to stop!

name: Glenn
dialog: Ha ha ha! There is no such thing as brothers that do not fight with one another. Even we fought, sometimes. But, when Dario realized that he was at fault, he would always apologize to me later. You can fight, but you must learn something from it!

name: Glenn
dialog: So, what are you fighting about?

name: Glenn
dialog: Ha ha ha! There is no such thing as brothers that do not fight with one another. Even we fought, sometimes. But, when Dario realized that he was at fault, he would always apologize to me later. You can fight, but you must learn something from it!

name: Glenn
dialog: So, what are you fighting about?

name: Glenn
dialog: ...His bride?

name: Glenn
dialog: ...... Whoa, you two are mature for your ages. But have you asked Marina how she feels about it?

name: Girl
dialog: H-How do I feel... Um, well... I like you both!

name: Glenn
dialog: Marina, these two are serious. It is best if you tell them how you truly feel.

name: Glenn
dialog: Marina, these two are serious. It is best if you tell them how you truly feel.

name: Girl
dialog: Uh, ummm... Th-The one I really like is John, who's training outside to become a hero... But John already has a girlfriend, Annie, so...

name: Glenn
dialog: ...This might be a bit hard to take, but I guess it can't be helped. But I guess it is better than her liking one of you more than the other...

name: Girl
dialog: Huh...?

name: Glenn
dialog: Uh, ahem. Nevermind... Even if you do not marry one of them, try to get along with them, alright?

name: Girl
dialog: Y-Yes... I'll do my best.

name: Glenn
dialog: Call me whenever you need help!

name: Macha
dialog: Welcome, Serge.. Call me whenever you need my help. If you want, I can help you right now! ~~~Thanks, maybe next time ~~~Please help me

name: Macha
dialog: Then take care of yourself. Don'tCHA get in over your head, do you hear me?

name: Macha
dialog: Right on, leave it to me! Nothing's more powerful than a mother's love!

name: Macha
dialog: ...Ahh. My help isn't needed this time. Too bad.

name: Korcha
dialog: Oh, it's you guys again. Didja come by to laugh at me? Ha, what losers...

name: Glenn
dialog: What on earth happened!? Could Lynx have done this!?

name: Member
dialog: What happened here!? Did Lynx do this!?

name: Harle
dialog: Zat'z correct. Hmm... Maybe not?

name: Harle
dialog: Ze correct answer iz, I did zis under Monsieur Lynx's order.

name: Harle
dialog: Salut, Serge. Did you miss moi?

name: Glenn
dialog: Harle!!! What have you done with Radius!?

name: Harle
dialog: Ooh lah lah... Glenn... You're all fired up.

name: Harle
dialog: Oooooooh...!

name: Glenn
dialog: Tell me!!!

name: Harle
dialog: Tsk, tsk, tsk!

name: Harle
dialog: Excusez-moi, Serge, but do you want to know why I burned zis place to ze ground?

name: System
dialog: ~~~Tell me ~~~Not really...

name: Harle
dialog: Ahh, oui? You are no fun.

name: Harle
dialog: Well, first of all to teach you all a lesson... And second of all to get rid of zat geezer who livez here. He iz an ally of ze Acacia Dragoonz, and I hear he'z quite skilled. I waz disappointed to see zat ze geezer izn't here. I wonder where he went?

name: Harle
dialog: And one more t'ing, Serge. Monsieur Lynx gave moi one more order. Zat iz to slow down your pursuit.

name: Harle
dialog: Here I go!

name: Harle
dialog: Listen, Serge... I know very well zat you do not want to fight moi, but... It would save mon honneur if you fight moi here.

name: Harle

I officially retired four years ago, after Dario received his father's sword, the Einlanzer. I have been here ever since, living a carefree life away from the rest of the world.

name: Radius

name: Radius
dialog: I do not know what this man Lynx is plotting... But I believe General Viper intends to overthrow the nation of Porre with the power of this legendary flame. Porre is a nation governed by militarism and has brought on suffering to many people on the central continent of Zenan. Perhaps the general envisions a bright and peaceful world, much like Guardia was at one time...

name: Radius

name: Radius

dialog: Is that the so-called evil sword, Masamune? Sir Radius, do you know anything about this sword?

name: Norris
dialog: What shall we do? We cannot make our way into the Dead Sea without removing that sword.

name: Member
dialog: There has to be a way! The Dead Sea is right under our nose!

name: Radius
dialog: Only the dragon sword, Einlanzer, can break the seal of the Masamune.

name: Norris
dialog: The Einlanzer? The sword forged by ancient Dragonians?

name: Member
dialog: The Einlanzer?

name: Radius
dialog: Yes... The legendary holy sword, forged by the Dragonites... I have placed that sword to rest beside its rightful owner, Garai. May he rest in peace within that cavern... Although it pains me to disturb his eternal sleep, we have no other choice...

name: Member
dialog: Where is this cavern...?

name: Radius
dialog: We know it today as the 'Isle of the Damned.' It used to be an ordinary cavern until it mutated into a nesting ground for demons... I believe this may be the result of Garai's sentiments which lingered. A negative sentiment, which the holy sword could not even restrain. In order to make our way in there, we need a certain item that Garai used while he was still alive. I have stored it away in a hut where Garai and I used to train. We must go and get this item...

name: Radius
dialog: We must do something about that sword in order to proceed. Let us withdraw for now.

name: Radius
dialog: We need the power of the Einlanzer to destroy that sword. We must withdraw for now. Let us stop by my hut. There is something I'd like to pick up before heading to the Isle of the Damned.

name: Radius
dialog: We need the power of the Einlanzer to destroy that sword. We must withdraw for now.

name: Radius
dialog: It took you long enough. I've been waiting forever.

name: Radius
dialog: ...... Dario's father, Garai, and I used to frequent this island for our training...

name: Radius
dialog: Sigh... I lose again...

name: Radius
dialog: Hah! You're about the only one who knows that, since we practice together so often.

name: Radius
dialog: Yeah, right...

name: Radius
dialog: The Einlanzer is a legendary holy sword passed onto the most skilled swordsman of the Acacia Dragoons. It belonged to Garai before Dario took over the title. He was a magnificent dragoon...

name: Radius
dialog: Could this really be it? The sword of legend... the Masamune!!!

name: Radius
dialog: My word...

name: Radius
dialog: What could be wrong? This is a legendary sword!!!

name: Radius
dialog: See, Garai...

name: Radius
dialog: There's nothing to fear!

name: Radius
dialog: Aahhh...

name: Radius
dialog: The Masamune... That sword is cursed with hate and sorrow... Anyone who lays his hands on it will be overcome with negative sentiments and will be driven mad... I......

name: Radius
dialog: ...... Enough talk from an old man... Just wait here a moment.

name: Radius
dialog: Sorry to keep you waiting. With this mirror, we should be able to make it to the inner parts of the Isle of the Damned.

name: System
dialog: Radius put away Garai's Keepsake.

name: Radius
dialog: Let us be off to the 'Isle of the Damned.'

name: Radius
dialog: No... Garai...! Nary a day passes when I haven't looked back on that day...

name: Radius
dialog: I was overcome by the power of that sword!

name: Radius
dialog: I know...

name: Radius
dialog: Hey, Garai...

name: Radius
dialog: HAHAHAHAHAA! Now I'm the top swordsman of the Acacia Dragoons!

name: Radius
dialog: Hah, I did it! I'm the greatest! HAHAHAHAAH...

name: Radius
dialog: Huh? What happened?

name: Radius
dialog: Oh Lord...? What have I done?

name: Radius
dialog: NOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

name: Radius
dialog: I know I lost my sanity because of that sword... But I must admit, the sword is not entirely to blame. I was jealous of Garai... I wanted to be the better swordsman. The once renowned Masamune... 'The Holy Sword That Conquered Darkness.' Could it be merely a tool for murder...?

name: Radius
dialog: Garai!? No...!

name: Radius
dialog: Listen to me, Garai! We need the Einlanzer to seal the cursed evil sword!

name: Radius
dialog: In order to  believe in what is right... must one suffer pain and sorrow?

name: Radius
dialog: I have always been prepared to fall to a sword held by one of your sons... Perhaps Glenn will take on that role, now that Dario is gone.

name: Radius
dialog: However, I must attend to some unfinished business. Please wait a little longer. Garai... Forgive me, my friend...

name: Radius
dialog: Come, Serge. The Einlanzer shall lead the way!

name: Radius
dialog: Oh, Garai... We shall use the holy powers of the Einlanzer...

name: Radius
dialog: The sword is a reflection of one's soul. How I pity you... You've done no wrong, either.

name: Radius
dialog: I just hope that, one day, that sword will be freed of enmity...

name: Radius
dialog: The Dead Sea... I cannot imagine what kind of spectacle lies ahead...

name: Radius
dialog: Where do you think you're going, Serge? The Dead Sea is right before our eyes!

name: Member
dialog: This is... the Dead Sea... This is some sight... I feel like I am living a nightmare...

name: Member
dialog: The waves are at a standstill... And... What is that dark shadow in the distance...?

name: Member
dialog: The treacherous ocean... The earth, condemned by Dragon Gods... It's not all that bad...

name: Norris
dialog: What is it, sir?

name: Norris
dialog: So many strange things happening here... The power source is still active. I do have knowledge of electrical engineering. Can you give me a minute, sir?

name: Norris
dialog: Let's see...

name: Norris
dialog: ......There... The monitor should be able to display some information, sir.

name: Member
dialog: Norris? Can't you download more info about this world?

name: Norris
dialog: Ahhh... Yes! One moment, please.

name: Member
dialog: What happened, Norris!!? What happened to the screen!?

name: Norris
dialog: The power supply has gone out. At this rate, we will not be able to gather further information. Damn... We were so close to learning more about 'Lavos'...

name: Norris
dialog: We will not be able to find out anything new... Let's proceed.

name: System
dialog: No power...

name: Norris
dialog: This must be the center of the Dead Sea... All this chaos must have spread out from here.

name: Member
dialog: This must be the center of the Dead Sea... All this chaos must've spread out from here.

name: Radius
dialog: The buildings seem to have melted into one giant conglomeration. What happened to this place?

name: Member
dialog: The buildings seem to have melted into one giant conglomeration. What's up with this place?

name: System
dialog: It's too slippery to make your way through the duct.

name: System
dialog: There's something on the ground.

name: Member
dialog: What's wrong, Serge? Did you see something?

name: Member
dialog: Are you alright?

name: Member
dialog: What? You saw a child? I didn't see a child anywhere...

name: Member
dialog: Nothing will surprise me here. ...Let's just keep going.

name: Member
dialog: We're inside a building, yet what's this thing doing in here...?

name: Member
dialog: This place is beyond me...

name: Zappa
dialog: Arrchh! What's goin' on here!? Karsh...!? Is that you, lad...!? Ah don't believe this...!

name: Radius
dialog: What in heaven's name is going on here...!? General...! Miss Riddel!!! And Glenn and the other dragoons...! What could have happened here...!?

name: Norris
dialog: Th-These are the Acacia Dragoons who disappeared 3 years ago... W-What went on here...?

name: Harle
dialog: It iz unfortunate, but it appearz zey were held captive here before zey died... It'z too late... Zey are so close, yet so far. No one can help zem...

name: Member
dialog: What's going on!? What does this all mean...!?

name: Member
dialog: Are you alright? What's wrong?

name: Member
dialog: You've been acting strangely ever since we entered the building. Is it that child again? Ther'es no turning back now! We must keep going, Serge.

name: Member
dialog: ...A sunset!? Have the clouds from the Dead Sea cleared up?

name: Member
dialog: It appears that the dimension itself is more unstable here than elsewhere. It's a time and space within a structure completely different from anywhere else.

name: Member
dialog: Luckily, the distortion to leave this place is still here. That's good news for us.

name: Member
dialog: Who are those children...?

name: Member
dialog: It's Serge's fault that the world will end up like this...?

name: Man
dialog: Welcome to the Tower of Geddon... Time Crash Ground Zero!

name: Man
dialog: It's been a while, Serge. ...But...I guess you don't remember who I am. I don't blame you. You were only a little child back then.

name: Man
dialog: I'm Miguel. A friend of your father. According to the time outside, it's been about 14 years since the night of the storm...

name: Member
dialog: How is that possible...!?

name: Member
dialog: How can this be!?

name: Member
dialog: Serge!? You can't be serious!?

name: Member
dialog: We can't just let ourselves die here!

name: Member
dialog: We're not going to make it!

name: Member
dialog: Why did you help us?

name: Member
dialog: Serge, you're concerned about the other world, aren't you?

name: Member
dialog: The dimensional distortion should be back in order. Let's head to Opassa Beach.

name: Member
dialog: Could this light be a wormhole?

name: Member
dialog: But the amulet isn't responding.

name: Member
dialog: So this is the dimensional gate...

name: Member
dialog: Then let's get going!

name: Harle
dialog: You are a nuisance! Are you planning to stand in Monsieur Lynx's way?

name: Zappa
dialog: Ye're a pain in me arse. Scram!

name: Van
dialog: Leave now! If you want to live.

name: Norris
dialog: Begone, demons, if you value your lives.

name: Sneff
dialog: Now's your chance to run, ffools!

name: Starky
dialog: Leeave now. Wee do not want to fiight in vaain.

name: Member
dialog: Begone, if you wish to live.

name: Harle
dialog: Get out of our way.

name: Member
dialog: We'll take you on.

name: Member
dialog: It looks like there's much chaos going on here.

name: Harle
dialog: An uprizing led by Serge!? So, Serge has become ze enemy of ze people...

name: Starky
dialog: A reevoolt led by Serge? Why do peeople kill one another?

name: Member
dialog: A revolt led by Serge...? Is Serge siding against the people?

name: Nikki
dialog: Serge....!!! You made it out alive..? I almost had to sing a requiem for myself, before I realized I somehow made it out alive... I still see and hear images from that place in my dreams all the time... Sorry man, I don't want to go out for a while.

name: Nikki
dialog: Who are you?

name: Glenn
dialog: You are...!? But that body of yours is not going to return to normal... I am sorry, but please leave. I do not want to see that face of yours for now.

name: Van
dialog: The soldiers are all dawdling around here... I do wonder what is happening?

name: Van
dialog: My goodness... You look like me...! Could you be a doppelgänger? If so, am I going to die and go to heaven soon?

name: Van
dialog: What are you talkin' about?

name: Van
dialog: So you are not? Hahaa, then you must be father's illegitimate son... Normally, this would be a tearful reunion or some such thing, but I am not a dullard.

name: Van
dialog: ...... I know this guy's me, but it hurts my head knowin' he's such a blockhead.

name: Van
dialog: How dare you! What do you mean 'BLOCKHEAD!?'

name: Van
dialog: Oh well, keep workin' on your paintings. I'll take care of all the dirty work.

name: Van
dialog: I do not comprehend what you are saying, but best of luck to you, too.

name: Van
dialog: ...... I guess there's problems in any world you go to. Hey, me! Let's both try to live up to our best!

name: Zappa
dialog: A craftsman's workshop is a dangerous place for a layman. It's yir own damn fault for coming near it. Besides, by what need do ah have to listen yir order? Ah'll take no orders from ye. Begone with ye, for ah've work to finish.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: So you are not going to stop work no matter what?

name: Zappa
dialog: Don't make me tell ye the same thing twice. Ah've got a short temper. If ye ken what ah said, then get yirself out.

name: Zappa
dialog: Ah dinnae care who tells me, ah'm no gonna stop workin'...

name: Zappa
dialog: Am ah over-working meself? Ah'm staindin' in front of mah own eyes... Nay, ah must be losing mah concentration. Focus, Zappa, focus!

name: Zappa
dialog: Whoa, is no that the Rainbow!? When ah was a lad, ah traveled with me wife searchin' for it but... So, it really exists. Ah would love to get mah hands on it... but from what ah can tell, this thing can't be forged by meself. Now, if we had another skilled blacksmith like yours truly, that would be a different story. Rather unlikely story, though. Hahaha!!!

name: Zappa
dialog: Ye be me...!?

name: Zappa
dialog: Ah need yir help. Ah want to hammer this thing to make that ye-know-what...

name: Zappa
dialog: That thing ye have... It's the Rainbow! So this ye-know-what ye be talkin' about is the Rainbow Axe, then?

name: Zappa
dialog: Ah knew ah could count on meself... So, shall we start hammerin'? It be a wee bit hard by meself, but two of us working together should be a breeze.

name: Zappa
dialog: Hmm... Ah would love to help ye... But this here hammer's too weak for the job. If ah had a sturdier hammer... Looks like ah'm no use to ye for the time being. My apologies.

name: Zappa
dialog: Ay... Ye might be right.

name: Pierre
dialog: That Serge, who had the privilege of meeting moi, was a villain after all... It is just as moi thought... you can never trust those silent types...!

name: Zoah
dialog: WE MEET AGAIN...

name: Karsh
dialog: It's been a while, Lynx... Or is it Serge?

name: Karsh
dialog: ...? That Porre scumbag's with you!? Humph, well as long as you're here, you're one of us. You! Stay put and listen to what we gotta say!

name: Karsh
dialog: After we fought you guys, we also entered Fort Dragonia too...

name: Karsh
dialog: General!!!

name: Karsh
dialog: He disappeared!? ......! Damn!

name: Karsh
dialog: This is bad... General! Are you alright!?

name: Viper
dialog: U-Ughhh... Riddel...

name: Karsh
dialog: Don't just stand around! Help the general!!!

name: Zoah
dialog: I CANNOT BELIEVE THIS WOULD HAPPEN TO THE GENERAL...

name: Marcy
dialog: Like...I can't believe it...

name: Zoah
dialog: WHAT IN DRAGOON'S NAME HAPPENED HERE...?

name: Marcy
dialog: So, like, what are all these shiny shards...?

name: Karsh
dialog: Not now! We have to stop the bleeding! Marcy, you pick up those broken pieces!

name: Karsh
dialog: We brought the general to Hermit's Hideaway and prayed for his recovery. He was able to escape death, but he still needs rest. However, we can't leave the manor for too long... So we came back here, leaving Marcy behind to take care of him, only to find...

name: Zoah
dialog: THE PORRE MILITARY HAD TAKEN CONTROL OF TERMINA...

name: Karsh
dialog: DAMMIT! What a shame!!!

name: Karsh
dialog: Because of them Porres!!! Whaddaya got to say to that!?

name: Norris
dialog: ...... I, too, question the methods the military has taken. That is why I am acting in line with Sir Lynx...

name: Karsh
dialog: Hmph!!! Then don't ya dare get in my way!

name: Karsh
dialog: That bastard. He's not gonna get away with this! We've got some fault in all of this, so we gotta do something about it.

name: Karsh
dialog: But first, we've gotta rescue Lady Riddel. She's being held captive at the manor, which the Porre military has converted into their headquarters... Hey, with your uniform, you can enter undetected, right? Let's join forces for the time being! It's not too late to go after him!

name: Zoah
dialog: ONE OF US WILL REMAIN HERE TO COLLECT INFO. THE OTHER WILL ENTER THE MANOR. LET US MEET AFTERWARDS.

name: Karsh
dialog: Oh yeah. The shards on the ground must've been the Dragon Tear... We've gathered as many as possible, but we don't have any use for it. You can have them.

name: Zoah
dialog: WE HAVE GOT TO HURRY. NOT MUCH TIME.

name: Zoah
dialog: WATCH OUT. WE HAVE NO IDEA WHAT THE PORRE MILITARY WILL PULL OFF.

name: Karsh
dialog: We don't have much time. Let's get a move on it!

name: Karsh
dialog: We're counting on ya!

name: Zappa
dialog: Karsh...!? Ye be alive, lad! Thank the heavens... Go show yer face to mother as well. She's been awaiting yir return.

name: Karsh
dialog: I don't know what's going on, but once this is settled, I'll do that.

name: Zappa
dialog: Aye, dinnae forget!

name: Karsh
dialog: Whaaat? Why the hell didja do that for!

name: Karsh
dialog: Ugh!!!

name: Karsh
dialog: Holy smokes, a fruitcake like you in MY room!? Arrgh, this makes me sick!

name: Pierre
dialog: This man is rather vulgaire... As a Deva, you must show more grace and refinement!

name: Karsh
dialog: Arrgh, this guy's useless!

name: Norris
dialog: Then bring this boy Serge to me, as soon as you find him.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Yes, sir!

name: Norris
dialog: Why, Sir Lynx!!!

name: Norris
dialog: Sir Lynx, where have you been all this time? We heard that you headed to Fort Dragonia with the general. Exactly what happened back there? There have been many strange occurrences since then. Perhaps you know of a boy named Serge?

name: Norris
dialog: ......!!! The man behind you is Acacia Dragoon Deva Karsh!!! Sir Lynx, you were in the middle of taking him into custody, sir?

name: Norris
dialog: ......!!! The man behind you is Acacia Dragoon Deva Zoah!!! Sir Lynx, you were in the middle of taking him into custody, sir? ...!!!

name: Norris
dialog: You are... me!? Wh-What is going on...?

name: Norris
dialog: Let's just say I am another you and leave it at that. Pardon me for saying this, but it appears that both of us need to look at the big picture. We will only have a limited understanding by staying in the same place.

name: Norris
dialog: S-Silence!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris, there is an urgent message from command!

name: Norris
dialog: What is it?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Umm, sir, it is a level 2 security message...

name: Norris
dialog: Go ahead, take no heed. This man is one of us.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Yes, sir! Grobyc has just arrived at the manor, sir.

name: Norris
dialog: Hmm... He is quite ahead of schedule. Understood, I will return ASAP.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Yes, sir!

name: Norris
dialog: Sir Lynx, forgive me, but I must return to the manor at once. Please come to the manor a little later. We will discuss this in more detail there.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Sir Lynx, please go on through. Please go on through.

name: Riddel
dialog: I do not know. And even if I did, I would never tell you!

name: Norris
dialog: Please, sir, this woman has done nothing wrong.

name: Norris
dialog: I do not believe that, sir. There has to be a better way to go about this! Just give it a little more time and...

name: Norris
dialog: No, please! Wait!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Yes, sir!

name: Norris
dialog: Please, wait. Think of what you are doing. Can you live with that?

name: Norris
dialog: This cannot be... Is he the one from the lab...?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Yes, sir!

name: Norris
dialog: Sir Lynx! Please excuse these squalid conditions.

name: Norris
dialog: Who are you? Another me!? W-What is going on...?

name: Norris
dialog: Let's just say I am another you and leave it at that. Pardon me for saying this, but it appears that both of us need to look at the big picture. We will only have a limited understanding by staying in the same place.

name: Norris
dialog: S-Silence!

name: Norris
dialog: I am sorry... There is nothing I can do about it.

name: Norris
dialog: Sir... This has been bothering me since we met up in Termina. You seem different from what I last remember... You just seem... different...

name: Member
dialog: This man's not Lynx.

name: Norris
dialog: What?

name: Member
dialog: He may look like Lynx on the outside, but his spirit is that of Serge.

name: Norris
dialog: Is it true? Sir Lynx... What has happened?

name: Norris
dialog: I see...

name: Norris
dialog: So the Serge commanding the insurgent troops is the real Lynx... Everything is starting to make sense.

name: Norris
dialog: We were wrong all along. We never should have joined forces with Lynx...

name: Norris
dialog: And what brings you here?

name: Karsh
dialog: Riddel!!! Where is Lady Riddel!!!? Bring her out, NOW!!! You lay one filthy finger on her and you die! ARGHHHHHH!

name: Member
dialog: General Viper's daughter should be here.

name: Norris
dialog: I see... Then you are here to rescue her.

name: Norris
dialog: Understood. I would like to help. Riddel should be in the basement prison. Please, take this.

name: System
dialog: Member received the Prison Key!

name: Norris
dialog: There is a sewage system below the prison. You should be able to break into the prison by making your way through the sewers. Use the hatch downstairs.

name: Norris
dialog: The sewers are full of monsters. Please be alert, I have heard of one particularly frightful monster.

name: Norris
dialog: I will be in the 1F main hall. Please meet me there once you rescue Riddel.

name: Norris
dialog: You can access the sewage system from a hatch downstairs.

name: Norris
dialog: Let us meet up at the 1F main hall after you rescue Riddel.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Hi, Orcha. It's that time again!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: You know... This...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Your guest is waiting in the basement.

name: Luccia
dialog: Vot is it you vant?

name: Luccia
dialog: You are really Lynx? There is somet'ing different about you.

name: Luccia
dialog: Dä?

name: Member
dialog: The water's flow is too fast... We should be able to stop it somewhere.

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg...! What the hell am I doin' here...?

name: Fargo
dialog: I miss the smell o' the sea...

name: Fargo
dialog: ARG!!!

name: Fargo
dialog: Somethin' down below!?

name: Member
dialog: Is anybody there?

name: Fargo
dialog: Aye! Hold on a bit.

name: Fargo
dialog: Heave...

name: Fargo
dialog: HOOOOOO!!!

name: Fargo
dialog: Shiver me timbers! LYNX!?

name: Member
dialog: Just calm down... Do you really think Lynx would be here?

name: Fargo
dialog: He's right before me eyes, ain't he!?

name: Member
dialog: This isn't Lynx. He's Serge on the inside.

name: Fargo
dialog: You're pullin' me leg!

name: Fargo
dialog: Hmmm... It is strange that he'd be here...

name: Fargo
dialog: But I'm honored that you would come save me. I owe ya one.

name: Member
dialog: We're not here to rescue you. We're here to rescue General Viper's daughter.

name: Fargo
dialog: Oh, is that so. Well, you ended up savin' me anyway. Let me help.

name: Member
dialog: Do you know where General Viper's daughter is?

name: Fargo
dialog: Aye...! A young lass was taken to the cell next door.

name: Fargo
dialog: Well, how do we get outta here?

name: Member
dialog: Here's the key to the prison.

name: Fargo
dialog: Oh, great.

name: Fargo
dialog: I'm gonna go free the others and make me escape. Good luck to ya.

name: Riddel
dialog: You are the cook, Orcha!

name: Riddel
dialog: What have you done to him!?

name: Riddel
dialog: How horrible... But why, Orcha...?

name: Riddel
dialog: NO!

name: Karsh
dialog: Lady Riddel!!! I have come to save you!

name: Karsh
dialog: Actually, this man ain't Lynx!

name: Member
dialog: Actually, this man isn't Lynx!

name: Member
dialog: It's too hard to explain. We're just here to take Riddel back.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: The fun's just about to start.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Please continue cooking.

name: Riddel
dialog: Stop Orcha!

name: Member
dialog: I told you, he's not Lynx!

name: System
dialog: Orcha joinedCHA party.

name: Norris
dialog: I will take it upon myself to make sure Riddel leaves the premises safely.

name: Norris
dialog: Please distract the soldiers while we make our escape.

name: Riddel
dialog: I would like to thank everyone from the bottom of my heart. I shall be heading to Hermit's Hideaway to take care of my father. Please be sure to stop by when you get the chance.

name: Karsh
dialog: Don't worry 'bout us. I'll make sure to wipe out all these Porre buffoons!

name: Riddel
dialog: Thank you... Karsh.

name: Member
dialog: What do you plan to do after all this?

name: Norris
dialog: I will be returning here.

name: Member
dialog: Then why don't you join us?

name: Norris
dialog: Thank you, I am honored. However, as a soldier of the Porre military, I cannot abandon my country or my men.

name: Norris
dialog: I will be fine. Thank you.

name: Norris
dialog: I wish you the best of luck.

name: Norris
dialog: When you get a chance, please come by and see me again, Norris... There is something I wish to give you. Good luck.

name: Norris
dialog: So you are the Norris from the other world. Please come by and see me when things settle down. There is something I wish to give you. Good luck.

name: Norris
dialog: We must hurry.

name: Riddel
dialog: Good-bye...

name: Member
dialog: We're completely surrounded...!

name: Member
dialog: It's not a good idea to leave now.

name: Member
dialog: I guess we can't talk our way out of this one...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Follow the commander's orders.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: You can't escape!

name: Member
dialog: I thought we already destroyed it?

name: Member
dialog: It must be a new type...

name: Member
dialog: It's right behind us!

name: Member
dialog: No! We're trapped!

name: Member
dialog: What do we do!?

name: Member
dialog: We don't have time!

name: Member
dialog: It won't be able to make it up here.

name: Member
dialog: Don't be foolish...!

name: Member
dialog: Unbelievable...

name: Member
dialog: This is endless!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Over here!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Huh? What was that noise?

name: Member
dialog: This is great!

name: Member
dialog: You're...!?

name: Member
dialog: Why did you save us?

name: System
dialog: Grobyc-joined-your-party.

name: Member
dialog: Let's escape while we still can.

name: Member
dialog: There should be a boat ready. Let's head to Hermit's Hideaway.

name: Norris
dialog: Who are you? Another me!? W-What is going on...?

name: Norris
dialog: Let's just say I am another you and leave it at that. Pardon me for saying this, but it appears that both of us need to look at the big picture. We will only have a limited understanding by staying in the same place.

name: Norris
dialog: S-Silence!

name: Norris
dialog: I am sorry... There is nothing I can do about it. You are a Norris from another world.

name: Norris
dialog: Please bring the Norris from your world, here. There is something I wish to give him.

name: Norris
dialog: Please take this, Norris... I no longer need it.

name: System

name: Norris
dialog: We have decided to withdraw from here. We shall be returning to the mainland in due time.

name: Norris
dialog: I must be off.
