name: Luccia
dialog: If the Dragon's Tear has anyt'ing to do vith it... You may be able to find something out in Guldove.

name: System
dialog: It says, 'Respect my behind.' There's a letter inside.

name: Karsh
dialog: Damn! What are those idiots up to!?

name: Radius
dialog: Halt.

name: Karsh
dialog: Hey, gramps...

name: Marcy
dialog: No, Radius. He's not Sir... I mean he's not Lynx.

name: Radius
dialog: So you mean to tell me that you are really Serge...?

name: Radius
dialog: Hmmm... This is hard to take in so suddenly, but I do not sense Lynx's evil within you...

name: Radius
dialog: Hmmm... So this is the me from the other world.

name: Radius
dialog: I expected nothing but the best. You have brilliant skills, just like me...

name: Radius
dialog: Hmph, that's my line. You have brilliant skills like mine to have been able to block like that.

name: Radius
dialog: Hoh-hoh-hoh-hoh!!!

name: Radius
dialog: Hoh-hoh-hoh-hoh!!!

name: Zoah
dialog: WHERE ARE YOU GOING? THEY WILL FIND YOU IF YOU LEAVE NOW.

name: Karsh
dialog: Where do you think you're going? They'll find us for sure if we leave now.

name: Zoah
dialog: I AM NOT USED TO BEING PURSUED...

name: Radius
dialog: I heard what happened. I just couldn't believe it until I saw it with my own eyes. Oh, and thank you for saving Miss Riddel. I am very grateful.

name: Radius
dialog: General Viper's wound is healing nicely, thanks to Marcy nursing him back to health. The general should be up and about by tomorrow.

name: Karsh
dialog: Rrrrargh!!! Those Porre jokers piss me off!!! At least we were able to save Lady Riddel. But still, one of these days, I'll kick every one of them out of our manor!

name: Riddel
dialog: Thank you kindly for everything, Serge. I have heard much of what has happened. We cannot allow Lynx to carry on like this. I owe you a debt of gratitude, so I would like to fight alongside you. I may be inexperienced in battle, but I hope you will find me helpful.

name: System
dialog: Riddel joined your party!

name: Riddel
dialog: You seem very tired. I do recommend that you rest.

name: Riddel
dialog: Would you like to rest? ~~~Yes ~~~No

name: Marcy
dialog: Serge... right? Ummm... Like... I'm sorry... for everything...

name: Harle
dialog: Hah hah! You're too cute to be ze killer doll, Marcy.

name: Marcy
dialog: W-WHAT!? Are you tryin' to pick a fight with me, Harle!?

name: Harle
dialog: I'm sure defeating zis Marcy will be a cinch.

name: Harle
dialog: Let'z fight, non?

name: Member
dialog: That's enough. We have a patient here.

name: Harle
dialog: D'accord... OK...

name: Marcy
dialog: NahÌ, nahÌ, na-na-nahÎ!

name: Harle
dialog: Bluuuugh!

name: Karsh
dialog: What the...!?

name: Viper
dialog: They have come.

name: Riddel
dialog: You look much better, daddy.

name: Viper
dialog: Sorry to worry you.

name: Viper
dialog: All thanks to Marcy. Sorry to trouble you like this, Marcy...

name: Viper
dialog: Looks like I worried everyone as well...

name: Karsh
dialog: Aaah, DAMN!!!

name: Kid
dialog: Show your face, Lynx! Yer 9 lives are up!!!

name: Karsh
dialog: ......!? I recognize that voice.

name: Zoah
dialog: INDEED.

name: Marcy
dialog: Kid...

name: Harle
dialog: Kid...

name: Member
dialog: Wait, Serge!

name: Kid
dialog: Oi, Lynx!!! Today's the day I finish you off!

name: Member
dialog: Are you alright!? She's quite serious. And...I have a bad feeling about this... She doesn't seem to be herself...

name: Serge
dialog: Heh heh heh... Yes...she is indeed Kid. However, right now, you are the one who is Lynx. And I am Serge. Once our roles were reversed, so were our problems. To her, killing you will avenge Lucca.

name: Serge
dialog: Right, Kid?

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah, I'll put an end to Lynx today... and avenge Lucca!!!

name: Member
dialog: I think we'd better retreat for now.

name: Serge
dialog: Give it up. We have this shack completely surrounded. There's no way you can escape.

name: Fargo
dialog: We'll see about that!

name: Fargo
dialog: Serge!!! Hop on!

name: Serge
dialog: Damn! They got away. Heh... Anyway... this is only the beginning... of everything...

name: Fargo
dialog: Good work, Polly.

name: Fargo
dialog: Good, good...

name: Kid
dialog: Hey, Serge...! How about you and me team up for a while? For cryin' out loud... Would ya just shut up and get on with it...! I'm gonna kick yer sorry arses so hard you'll kiss the moons!

name: Kid
dialog: Just you wait, Lynx! Today's gonna be the day of reckonin'!!! Say yer prayers! ...Not that it'll do ya any good!!!

name: Kid
dialog: I've had it up ta here with you!!!

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah... I know. This is the end of you, Lynx!!! Say yer prayers!

name: Harle
dialog: Serge...

name: Harle
dialog: Tell me... What iz ze most important t'ing in your life...? Ask yourself what you can do, and what you need to do, in order to attain it.

name: Harle
dialog: If not you, zen whom!? If not now, zen when!? Right? ...Serge?

name: Fargo
dialog: Viper!!! Let's settle this old score once and for all!!! Prepare yerself!!!

name: Viper
dialog: ...... Is that you, Serge.? Fargo, our duel will have to wait. I need to have a talk with Serge..

name: Fargo
dialog: Tch... Have it yer way...

name: Viper
dialog: Serge, Lynx has headed to the Sea of Eden. We must do everything in our power to prevent him from obtaining the Frozen Flame. I shall lend a hand. We must put a stop to him.

name: System
dialog: General Viper joined your party!

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg... What the hell...

name: Fargo
dialog: Aye, Serge! I'll help ya out, too. Ya saved me life twice already. And, I guess I already know too much. I can't just sit around and ignore the situation.

name: System
dialog: Fargo joined yer party!

name: Fargo
dialog: Viper! I'll deal with ya later. Once we put an end to this situation, you're mine!

name: Viper
dialog: Very well. I will not run from you. I will be happy to accept your challenge.

name: Marcy
dialog: Waaaaaait!

name: Marcy
dialog: We're comin', too. I hope that's okay with you, Serge?

name: System
dialog: Marcy, like, joined your party!

name: Zoah
dialog: I, TOO, WOULD LIKE TO HELP. THERE IS NO POINT IN MY NOT FIGHTING. PLUS, YOU SAVED MISS RIDDEL. ACCEPT THIS GESTURE AS A TOKEN OF MY APPRECIATION.

name: System
dialog: ZOAH JOINED YOUR PARTY!

name: Karsh
dialog: Hah! There ain't no way I'm backin' outta this. And since you saved Lady Riddel, I've decided to help you out. Please, just a thank you will be enough!

name: System
dialog: Karsh joined your party!

name: Viper
dialog: Shall we be on our way, Serge?

name: Member
dialog: A dead end?

name: Member
dialog: Can't we go any further?

name: Member
dialog: Do you know how to get through here?

name: Harle
dialog: You wish to know?

name: Harle
dialog: Zis place iz called ze Pearly Gates. Zis used to be ze only entrance to ze Sea of Eden. However, legend sayz, no one haz been able to see it or approach it, ever since ze Dragonz sealed ze evil flame.

name: Member
dialog: Then how are we supposed to get in?

name: Harle
dialog: You need ze powerz of ze Dragonz zat sealed ze flame. You must break ze seal of ze Pearly Gates with2 relics from each of ze 6 Dragonz.

name: Member
dialog: Relics? Break the seal? You mean here?

name: Harle
dialog: Non. Ze true gate to ze Sea of Eden iz not here. It iz in ze other world, Where ze Dead Sea liez.

name: Member
dialog: So, where are we supposed to find the 6 Dragons?

name: Harle
dialog: You will find zem scattered around both worldz. Zey will be eazy to find, with2 all ze legendz about dragonz throughout ze islandz.

name: Harle
dialog: Oh, and Monsieur Lynx... Ze other Monsieur Lynx, disguized az Serge, iz already in here. Zat iz because hiz appearance iz zat of Serge.

name: Member
dialog: What do you mean?

name: Harle
dialog: Even if you are able to get all 6 Dragon Relics, you will not be able to make it inside az Monsieur Lynx.

name: Member
dialog: Then what are we supposed to do?

name: Harle
dialog: Ze Dragon Tear... Zat iz all I can tell you. Now, it'z my turn to ask un question.

name: Harle
dialog: Monsieur Lynx...

name: Harle
dialog: If you had to chooze between ze world or moi... which would you chooze? ~~~Harle ~~~The world ~~~I don't know

name: Harle
dialog: Oooh... Merci... Even if it iz a lie.

name: Harle
dialog: Tsk, tsk, tsk!

name: Harle
dialog: That iz exactly what I t'ought Monsieur Lynx would say.

name: Fargo
dialog: You go, sea-dog! Go and find yerself!

name: Riddel
dialog: I wish you well.

name: Harle
dialog: Why must I have to tell him such t'ings...? You are such an idiote, Harle...

name: Starky
dialog: What's wrong, Harle? There is fluid coming out of youur eyes.

name: Harle
dialog: ......!? Oh, it'z you, Starky. It'z not'ing. Don't worry about it.

name: Starky
dialog: Something is different. Starky can tell. Harle's maake-up doesn't look the saame todaay.

name: Starky
dialog: Starky don't think it's nothing liike youu saay. Why do youu liie to mee, Harle?

name: Harle
dialog: D'accord... OK, OK... I guess I cannot fool you.

name: Harle
dialog: Listen, Starky... Zis iz called a tear. It'z somet'ing zat flowz from your eyez naturellement when you are sad, when you hurt...

name: Starky
dialog: Teear...? To cry...? Soo water comes out from eyes when youu are sad? Are youu sad soo youu can wash youur faace with teear?

name: Harle
dialog: Sigh... Go to sleep, Starky. And don't tell anyone I waz crying. You promise you will not tell?

name: Starky
dialog: Starky liike promises. Starky will promise not to tell aanyone that Harle was cryiing.

name: Starky
dialog: Waait a minute... Cryiing meeans that Harle is sad. But why?

name: Harle
dialog: Even though we are close, I cannot tell you zat.

name: Harle
dialog: You will find out eventually, Starky. If zat time comez...

name: Harle
dialog: Every problème haz a solution... I hope...

name: Karsh
dialog: Man... I feel relieved... Actually... No...! Forget it!

name: Riddel
dialog: I can hear Karsh yelling at times... I do wonder what is troubling him...?

name: Marcy
dialog: Hey, Serge.. C'mon, take me with you. I wanna beat up Lynx real bad!

name: Member
dialog: What is it?

name: Member
dialog: If we're able to cross dimensions here... We should be able to make it into the Sea of Eden.

name: Member
dialog: Is this a wormhole?

name: Member
dialog: This must be what Harle was talking about.

name: Member
dialog: What should we do now? At this rate we won't be able to borrow the Dragon Tear.

name: Member
dialog: Speaking of the Dragon Tear... Shouldn't we return the broken tear to the shrine in the other world? The shaman in the other world might be able to help us somehow.

name: Old Man
dialog: M-M-Master Viper!? Oh, my goodness... Could this be a dream?

name: Viper
dialog: This is no dream... I always knew, that you have been polishing my statue all these years... I must express my deepest gratitude to you. I give you my promise to bring Termina back into our hands once again.

name: Old Man
dialog: Oh, precious words for such an unworthy old soul...!

name: System
dialog: It won't open! There must be a way... Received Zoah's Toss&Spike!

name: Viper
dialog: A trap...! If I recall, there is a note with instructions on how to bypass this trap. It should be in the drawer inside my room.

name: System
dialog: There's a switch. ~~~Push it ~~~Leave it alone

name: Marcy
dialog: I swear, I'm gonna teach that Lynx a lesson! After I'm done with him, he'll be beggin' for 9 more lives!

name: Riddel
dialog: Where might we be drifting to, now?

name: Viper
dialog: First, we must track down Lynx. We do not have time to spare, Serge.. Let us head to the Sea of Eden.

name: Karsh
dialog: Tch...! I'm gettin' restless here! C'mon, Serge., take me with you!

name: Karsh
dialog: Man... This guy sleeps like a log!

name: Zoah
dialog: ZZZZ... ZZZZ...

name: Zoah
dialog: BUZZZZ... ZZZZZZ...

name: Zoah
dialog: UGHAHA... ZZZZ... MMMM...

name: Zoah
dialog: THAT WAS YUMMY...

name: System
dialog: Pip joined your party again!

name: Member
dialog: Doens't that seem odd to you?

name: Member
dialog: Are they quarrelling among themselves? It's pretty one-sided.

name: Member
dialog: What should we do? ~~~Help out ~~~Forget it...

name: Member
dialog: Stop! Aren't you comrades?

name: Member
dialog: Have we brought about any change by defeating that Hydra...? Did we do the right thing?

name: Member
dialog: Who knows what is right or wrong? Nobody has the answer. ...Serge, we should get going.

name: Member
dialog: Serge, isn't there something strange about this village?

name: Member
dialog: Hmm? What's going on? People are gathering over there. Let's go find out what's up.

name: Member
dialog: Porre soldiers!? In a small village like this!?

name: Member
dialog: But something's odd. And who's that lady?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Wh-Why me, sir?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Y-You heard us. C-Cease your r-resistance. A woman should...be more gentle a-and lady-like...

name: Member
dialog: Wait! I order you and your troops to return to headquarters. We will take care of this girl. This village will be under Sir Lynx's command until further notice. Report that back to high command.

name: Member
dialog: Didn't you hear? This is an order from your superior officer. If you disobey, you will be court-martialed. Do I make myself clear?

name: Doc
dialog: I cannot believe it... Is it possible that such a thing can occur...?

name: Doc
dialog: Hey, even you should not get up so soon. ...Are you alright? Even though you are a trained fighter, you should refrain from pushing yourself too hard.

name: Member
dialog: Serge received the SapphireBrooch.

name: Doc
dialog: Orlha!? Is that your sister's...?

name: Doc
dialog: Even though I understand what happened logically, emotionally, I haven't straighten things out. I am sorry, Serge.. Please give me a little more time. I would be just a burden to you in this state, man.

name: Peppor
dialog: I-If you want to shake it on past us...

name: Solt
dialog: You most definitely must bring Karsh here!

name: Peppor
dialog: S-Sir Karsh...! Y-You actually shook it here!

name: Solt
dialog: Do you knowingly know why we are here...?

name: Karsh
dialog: Hell NO! WHAT!? Am I supposed to...!?

name: Peppor
dialog: Don't shake ignorance!

name: Solt
dialog: We came to investigate what happened here!!!

name: Peppor
dialog: Sir Karsh! W-We have stood by your side, unable to shake loose this one suspicion we had...

name: Karsh
dialog: Suspicion...!?

name: Solt
dialog: We believe you may have killed Sir Dario!

name: Peppor
dialog: And by shaking it here, our suspicion has turned to conviction! S-Sir Karsh... We are executing you for the murder of Sir Dario!

name: Karsh
dialog: Dario...

name: Riddel
dialog: How is your training going, everyone?

name: Dario
dialog: Miss Riddel!

name: Riddel
dialog: I brought something special for everyone today...

name: Glenn
dialog: Oh, really? What is it, what is it? Viper Churros?

name: Riddel
dialog: Wrong answer, Glenn. Next? Are they really that good?

name: Glenn
dialog: Uh-huh! I can chomp down ten of those easily!

name: Dario
dialog: Hahaha... You're always like that. Those churros were originally iron rations for knights. Overeating is not good discipline.

name: Dario
dialog: So, Miss Riddel, what have you brought us? Please don't make us hold our breath too long.

name: Riddel
dialog: This is it! I found it in Fossil Valley. Isn't it pretty?

name: Glenn
dialog: Ah shoot, it's just a flower!

name: Dario
dialog: Miss Riddel, did you go to the valley by yourself...?

name: Riddel
dialog: What, I'm not allowed to? It's just the valley, I'm sure it's safe enough.

name: Riddel
dialog: I have enough for everyone; I will give some to you boys! Glenn doesn't want any, right?

name: Glenn
dialog: Since you've gone through the trouble of getting it, I'll take one, too! If I plant its seeds, I might get some good fruit from it!

name: Riddel
dialog: Oh, how silly of you, Glenn!

name: Riddel
dialog: Here you go, Glenn. But I don't think it will grow any fruit, though.

name: Glenn
dialog: You don't know until you try!

name: Riddel
dialog: Karsh might not like things like flowers, but...

name: Karsh
dialog: ...... N-No, it's not that...

name: Dario
dialog: You brought me one, too. This is beautiful... What kind of flower could this be?

name: Riddel
dialog: It is a 'bellflower.'

name: Dario
dialog: Miss Riddel, if you ever wish for this flower, I will go for you instead. If anything should happen to you...

name: Riddel
dialog: Then let us go together. Does that sound like a good idea?

name: Dario
dialog: ...... Yes, very well.

name: Dario
dialog: ...Karsh? Are you listening?

name: Karsh
dialog: Huh...? Oh, sorry. So what is it? What's with the formality?

name: Dario
dialog: ...U-Umm. How should I... Actually, I...

name: Karsh
dialog: Why are ya acting so strange? Spit it out...

name: Dario
dialog: ...A-Ay. To tell you the truth...

name: Riddel
dialog: Karsh, we are pledged to marry. I have already told daddy about it...

name: Dario
dialog: Th-That is what I wanted to tell you... Will you bless us with your approval, Karsh?

name: Karsh
dialog: ...? Marry...? S-So that's it! Well, congratulations! So when's it gonna be, and where?

name: Dario
dialog: We haven't decided on a date yet. We still need to finish surveying the Isle of the Damned, first. It's just that...

name: Karsh
dialog: Just what...?

name: Dario
dialog: I want the wedding here. The place where we have cried together, laughed together, and shared our dreams...together.

name: Karsh
dialog: Grin You never change, Dario. Hey, then I'll have to fill this dull vacant lot with loads of bellflowers. Just tell me if I can help ya in any way.

name: Dario
dialog: ...Thank you, Karsh.

name: Karsh
dialog: This must be it!

name: Dario
dialog: Karsh, why are you in such a hurry? The enemy is not going anywhere, and the footing here is bad...

name: Karsh
dialog: Why do you always have to be like that, Dario? The Masamune may be in there! Any dragoon would be hyped to see that thing! You know!?

name: Karsh
dialog: Shaker Brothers, you stay here.

name: Solt
dialog: Sir!

name: Peppor
dialog: S-Sir!

name: Karsh
dialog: Let's get goin', Dario.

name: Dario
dialog: Fine...

name: Karsh
dialog: Is that... the Masamune!?

name: Karsh
dialog: Was I really just possessed by that devilish sword...? Driven by such intense hatred and envy...? Maybe deep inside me, I was filled with hatred? Dario, the one whom I could never beat, no matter how much I tried...the one who stole Riddel's heart from me...

name: Karsh
dialog: What if that sword does not imbed hatred into the mind of its wielder... but instead draws out and ignites the flames of hatred hidden within the hearts of men...? And if that hatred was something deep within the wielder to begin with...? Then what have I...?

name: Peppor
dialog: S-So you do know something about it!

name: Karsh
dialog: Take it easy...! Why the hell do I have to fight you guys!?

name: Solt
dialog: No time for questions!

name: Karsh
dialog: Tch! What the hell!?

name: Peppor
dialog: R-Running away!?

name: Solt
dialog: Makes him look even more suspiciously suspicious!

name: Karsh
dialog: Listen, I don't wanna fight you!!!

name: System
dialog: Karsh learned Axiomatic!

name: Karsh
dialog: Listen to me... I did not kill Dario... I know the time will come when I can speak the truth. But I can't just yet... I hope you understand.

name: Peppor
dialog: Sir Karsh...! I have come to an understanding after that battle we just had... You are not an evil person. You would never kill your best friend! Please forgive us... Looking back now, you were the one who took us under your wing, even though we were dragoon outcasts. You are very special to us, Sir Karsh!

name: Solt
dialog: Sob...! We believe you, Sir Karsh...! We must be on our way, but we hope to see you again, sometime, somewhere... When that time comes, we hope you will be readily ready to tell us what really happened!

name: Peppor
dialog: A-And... We're sorry we took this from you. We're shaking it back to you.

name: System
dialog: Karsh received MementoPendant!

name: Karsh
dialog: ...Thanks. I'll take good care of it. One day, I promise to tell you guys the truth... Take care.

name: System
dialog: Orcha received DinnerGuest!

name: Starky
dialog: Where did youu catch this fish?

name: Man
dialog: Oh, this here sawfish? I caught it near the El Nido Triangle. Why do you want to know? By the way, shorty, you alright with that fish bowl over your head? Your face is all blue.

name: Starky
dialog: Noo problem foor Starky. Blue is fiine with mee. Doon't try this at hoome, thoough. If youu caught it neear the El Nido Triiangle, then that thing insiide must bee miine.

name: Starky
dialog: Can Starky taake back what's miine?

name: Man
dialog: There's something inside that thing? Well, if it's yours, be my guest.

name: System
dialog: Starky received Plasma Pistol!

name: Starky
dialog: Starky am suppoosed to saay something graateful, coorrect? Youu are welcome.

name: Man
dialog: Hey, you have great manners, shorty. But that's my line. Just a thanks will do. There aren't too many like you these days. I wish kids would be more courteous like you.

name: System
dialog: Starky also learned Thanks! But who cares? Right...?

name: System
dialog: There's a mushroom growing underneath the treasure chest. There's a mushroom growing.

name: System
dialog: Received Funguy's Myconoids!

name: Fargo
dialog: Hey, you. The concert's over. Now my Marbule will fall into decay and become just an eternal dream... Hahhahah!!!

name: Fargo
dialog: You land-lubber...! You're pitiful!!!

name: Fargo
dialog: Call me what you want, but it's too late now... We can't turn back time. Now let go of me!

name: Fargo
dialog: Tch!!!

name: Fargo
dialog: Irenes... Looks like your last hope has evaporated. This is how it should be. Everything will cease to exist... Only the beautiful memories will remain.

name: System
dialog: The Black Dragon remains asleep...

name: Nikki
dialog: Oh, it's you! We're all set to go! All we have to do now is convince my father to take this ship to Marbule... But that's the hardest part. I wonder if there's anyone out there who can convince him? If so... it would have to be someone with a genuine heart, like the father I used to know.

name: Nikki
dialog: ......!!! Father! What are you doing here? Have you changed your mind?

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg! I'll take care of this. I have ta manage me own affairs.

name: Nikki
dialog: Well, Irenes? Did you find anyone who might be able to bring Fargo back to reality?

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg! I'll take care of this. I have ta manage me own affairs.

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg! Leave it ta me.

name: Luccia
dialog: Of course... But vot dat child really needs is a loving family. I cannot provide dat...

name: Marcy
dialog: You knew my mom...?

name: Fargo
dialog: Aye, land-lubber...!

name: Fargo
dialog: Are you, me...?

name: Fargo
dialog: Don't even associate yerself with me...! You're bein' a sissy, Fargo! You're pathetic!!! I, too, had the possibility of becomin' a jelly-belly like yerself!

name: Fargo
dialog: I know about the plan... We're movin' this ship along with Nikki's to Marbule and showerin' the island with his song at full volume... Once the dream spirits awaken, we'll defeat 'em one by one...

name: Fargo
dialog: My ship, the Zelbess... This ship can no longer set sail... I can't steer it...

name: Fargo
dialog: Hah! Who's askin' ya anyway?

name: Fargo
dialog: Listen up, mateys! This ship is no longer the Zelbess but the S.S. Invincible! Set the course for Marbule, and man yer stations...!

name: Fargo
dialog: It's useless...

name: Fargo
dialog: We'll see about that!

name: Fargo
dialog: H-How the...!?

name: Fargo
dialog: Ya don't even know that!? The desire to return to one's home is steerin' this ship forward...

name: Fargo
dialog: You mean the demi-humans...?

name: Fargo
dialog: Once this ship reaches Marbule, Nikki will begin his concert. We gotta do what we can to wake those monsters from their nightmare... So long, Fargo... I've come to me senses. It's time you did the same.

name: Nikki
dialog: Adrift, adrift, adrift... From how many dreams have I awakened? How many morrows have passed...? The days when victory meant everything have ~ come to an end... ~ Yesterday's friends become ~~ tomorrow's foes... ~~ So flow the days filled with betrayal and enmity... Once one reaches the summit, all that remains is one's ~    inevitable downfall... ~   All has become lost...   ~ The innumerable wounds, once decorations of glory, have begun instead to ache... Aaah, have I awoken...? Where might I be...? Could this be the Grave of the Narwhales that is said to lie hidden in the seas? Where am I!? So...I am all alone. Just deserts for the likes of me... Betrayed by the very ones in whom I trusted... Gone are the friends with whom I shared my dreams... Alone, with no lover to share my sorrows...

name: Nikki
dialog: Is someone thither?

name: Nikki
dialog: Be it thou...? My savior sweet?

name: Nikki
dialog: Be thou not a mere maiden but a... mer-maiden?

name: Nikki

But they were blown off course and came ashore on this island, where they decided to seek shelter. At the time, this research center was off-line due to the severity of the storm. It only took 10 minutes for the system to power back up, but by then, the Flame had found you...

name: Lynx

name: Kid
dialog: ......!!! (Bugger! How'd she know 'bout that!?)

name: Kid
dialog: AHHH! KORCHA!

name: Korcha
dialog: Don'tCHA worry, Kid. I voted for ya!

name: Kid
dialog: Sheesh...! I'm honored!

name: Korcha
dialog: Well...ummm... You know... About that agreement we had... Why don'tCHA tell me your answer?

name: Korcha
dialog: ...Y-You don't have to answer immediately, but... How about just gettin' engaged for now, you know...!?

name: Korcha
dialog: We'll have a blast together! I'll treat ya right! We can go fishin' everyday, and I'll take you anywhere thatCHA wanna go in my boat! We'll settle down in Guldove and raise a happy family! Well?

name: Macha
dialog: 'Well,' what? Aren'tCHA happy with the way things are, now?

name: Korcha
dialog: Ma!? WhatCHA doin' here?

name: Macha
dialog: Aren't I allowed to go shoppin'!? From the sounds of it, you just hit puberty!

name: Korcha
dialog: W-Whatever, ma!

name: Solt
dialog: Is something wrongly wrong, Monsieur Pierre? This is it! There is no turning back now!

name: Peppor
dialog: Shake it! Pierre! Solt!

name: Peppor
dialog: J-Just you wait, Lynx! We'll teach you a lesson about General Viper's spice, I mean, spite! Shake it and say your prayers! ...Not that it'll do you any good!

name: Solt
dialog: Monsieur Pierre! Let us be on our way!

name: Pierre
dialog: Actually... Moi seem to have an upset stomach from last night's party at Monsieur Zappa's. It is not a good idea for moi to run...

name: Solt
dialog: ...Are you seriously serious about being a hero?

name: Peppor
dialog: Th-That's pathetic!!!

name: Pierre
dialog: P-Please! Do not run!!!

name: Peppor
dialog: H-Huh!? What just happened!?

name: Peppor
dialog: W-What are we doin' out here!?

name: Peppor
dialog: W-We're so high up! I-Is this thing floatin'!?

name: Solt
dialog: Our bodies seem to have passed through the floor just now...

name: Peppor
dialog: Th-This sure is some fort... Huh, Pierre? ......!?

name: Peppor
dialog: W-What's shakin', Pierre? You alright? You don't look so well. W-Who knows if there'll be a toilet up ahead! Shake it and hold it in!

name: Pierre
dialog: Moi should be fine... Moi am a hero... I-I'll do mon best...

name: Peppor
dialog: W-We shook out a lot of cash to hire you! You better!!!

name: Peppor
dialog: S-Someone shake it and open that door!

name: Solt
dialog: We shall leave this up to you, Peppor!

name: Peppor
dialog: W-Why me!?

name: Pierre
dialog: Tah ta-tah! Moi say we decide this with a game of rock, paper, scissors. That would be appropriate, non?

name: Peppor
dialog: G-Good idea! You're a true hero, alright! OK, ready...? Rock, paper, scissor... SHAKE!

name: Solt
dialog: It is you, Monsieur Pierre!

name: Pierre
dialog: Ohhhhhh... Moi feel the squirts coming on...! Oh, the pain... the pain...

name: Peppor
dialog: ...Ohhh man... Alright, let's shake another game...

name: Pierre
dialog: Oui, oui, oui!!! Indeed!

name: System
dialog: The three of them were never heard from again...

name: Leena
dialog: Come on, Lisa! What are you doing!? We won't be able to get good seats if we don't leave now!

name: Leena
dialog: What!? I don't believe this... Hurry up and find them! We'll be standing all the way in the back at this rate!

name: Leena
dialog: But I never knew she was so talented. Nikki was almost begging her to join.

name: Leena
dialog: My, my... Don't we have an ego...

name: Leena
dialog: Yeah, come on! We have to hurry!

name: Nikki
dialog: To all you rockers out there in Termina! Many thanks for coming out to see our gig! I hope you're all having a great time at the Viper Festival! At this time, I'd like to introduce some of our new band members!

name: Nikki
dialog: On percussion, Serge!!!

name: Nikki
dialog: And on vocals, we have Kid!!!

name: Kid
dialog: Oi, everyone! I'm the new vocalist for the Magical Dreamers! Kid's me name! You guys ready to rock!?

name: Nikki
dialog: Last, but not least, our mascot, Razzly!!!

name: Nikki
dialog: With our new, powerful line-up, we're gonna rock you out of this world! And now, our opening number...!

name: Harle
dialog: Salut, Monsieur Lynx! Did you dream of moi? Ooh lah lah!

name: Harle
dialog: We have another grand day ahead of us!

name: Harle
dialog: Good morning to you, too! Keep up ze good work wit' zat well!

name: Harle
dialog: Salut!

name: Harle
dialog: Bravo! Excellente! Keep up ze good work!

name: Harle
dialog: Non, non...! Monsieur Lynx iz very buzy today!

name: Harle
dialog: Arghhh... Nah-nah!

name: Harle
dialog: Good morning!

name: Harle
dialog: Sure, but maybe later, non?

name: Harle
dialog: Phew...

name: Harle
dialog: Oh, good morning, sirène of ze sea! About zat person you were looking for... Leave it to us!

name: Harle
dialog: Zat iz no problème for Monsieur Lynx.

name: Harle
dialog: Salut!

name: Harle
dialog: So, what iz ze agenda for today?

name: Harle
dialog: Hm?

name: Harle
dialog: Good morning, Sage!

name: Harle
dialog: Zere iz not'ing Monsieur Lynx cannot do, non?

name: Harle
dialog: Oui? What iz it?

name: Harle
dialog: Are you saying...

name: Harle
dialog: Looks like you've kept an eye on him! Well, Monsieur Lynx? How about it? Of course, I will help, too.

name: Harle
dialog: Monsieur Lynx... You will find un way to get your old self back.

name: Harle
dialog: But until zen, let'z do what we can for ze demi-humans here, non?

name: Harle
dialog: You are needed here. No matter how you look on ze outside, you are you! And zat iz what iz important. Everybody iz looking to you for guidance. You can do it, Monsieur Lynx... I know you can! Don't worry, I will be by your side... Serge...

name: Serge
dialog: Well, well, well... If it isn't the 3 old farts... I'll hear what you have to say...

name: Radius
dialog: Listen well! The countless evil deeds you have commited cannot go unpunished! We can no longer allow you to do as you please! Prepare yourself!

name: Zappa
dialog: Ah hear ye be the bastard that killed all the dragoons dead. That's why ah'm here, to avenge me son!

name: Fargo
dialog: Arg! I, too, am a villain, but me reasons are just! You're nothin' but a disgrace!

name: Serge
dialog: Hah. I really don't have time to deal with the likes of you...

name: Kid
dialog: Oi! I ain't gonna let you get in the way of Serge's plan!

name: Serge
dialog: That's the way it goes... But I do need to get used to my new body... I'll make a special exception today, and take you on as well.

name: Radius
dialog: Prepare, scoundrel!

name: Kid
dialog: Hah! Any time you're ready!

name: Karsh
dialog: Teeeen-huuut!

name: Karsh
dialog: General, the time has finally come for the Acacia Dragoons to sally forth!

name: Marcy
dialog: Can I kill 'em all yet?

name: Viper
dialog: Hmmm...

name: Viper
dialog: Everyone, prepare yourselves to face Serge's army! Long live the pride and honour of the Acacia Dragoons!!!

name: Zoah
dialog: ARGH!!!

name: Norris
dialog: It appears this battle is unavoidable...

name: Norris
dialog: I am sure the Porre army will strike back in full force... Perhaps this, too, is fate.

name: Viper
dialog: Move out!!!

name: Serge
dialog: Shall we get started...?

name: Harle
dialog: Monsieur Lynx...

name: Harle
dialog: Zis iz a nice change, non? Just taking it eazy. Before, I would travel all over ze place with2 ze other Monsieur Lynx. I've never stayed in one place for so long.

name: Harle
dialog: I wish... it could be like zis a bit longuer...

name: Harle
dialog: Time for dinner, non?

name: Harle
dialog: What would you like ce soir? ~~~Your specialty... ~~~Whatever...

name: Harle
dialog: Oui? Zen I will do mon best! I have to go steal... I mean get some ingredients, so wait here... Mon chéri...

name: Kid
dialog: Mon chéri, Mon SHMERI!

name: Harle
dialog: Ooh lah lah... Are you still being shy? You are Monsieur Lynx. Show some confiance. Zis human named Serge no longuer existz in zis world. Just accept it. C'est la vie!

name: Kid
dialog: I see... Serge, too...

name: Kid
dialog: I finally found you...

name: Harle
dialog: Ooh lah lah... You are still alive.

name: Kid
dialog: Of course I am! I have more lives than a cat!

name: Kid
dialog: What are you doin' here anyway, Lynx!? This is pathetic! This whole situation is pissin' me off!

name: Harle
dialog: Zut! Zat crazy blonde iz disturbing us again.

name: Kid
dialog: Shut up! I ain't here to see you!

name: Kid
dialog: Listen up, Lynx! First you take Lucca, and now Serge! It's time for you to pay!

name: Kid
dialog: Prepare yerself, Lynx! You ain't gettin' away this time! You're goin' down!

name: Serge
dialog: Hm? Is something wrong, Kid?

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah... Looks like we've got company. I'll hold 'em off here. You go on ahead, Serge.

name: Serge
dialog: Fine... I'm counting on you, Kid.

name: Harle
dialog: Kid...

name: Kid
dialog: Not you again...! I thought you were with Lynx!?

name: Harle
dialog: You're......I see... I am in a hurry. Would you mind letting me through, pleaze?

name: Kid
dialog: Hah! It'll take a little more than a 'pleaze' to let you through. Over my dead body, I say!

name: Harle
dialog: Kid! It iz senseless for us to fight! We must stop Serge... I mean, Monsieur Lynx!

name: Kid
dialog: Quit tryin' to talk yer way out of it! I don't like you. It's as simple as that! I don't care if it is senseless for us to fight!

name: Harle
dialog: D'accord... Zen I guess it cannot be helped...

name: Kid
dialog: So you're finally ready to face the music, eh!? Put up yer dukes!

name: Old Man
dialog: Morning! I hope you don't mind. Oh? Are you here to consult the Record of Fate again? You sure are devoted.

name: Old Man
dialog: Heh heh... There's not much else to do at my age... Oh, please... You're still young! Take your time.

name: Old Man
dialog: Let's see now... H-Holy cow...! A-A-Ahhh This can't be...! H-Help!!! What's wrong?

name: Old Man
dialog: Th-The Record of Fate...

name: Woman
dialog: Oh my!

name: Old Man
dialog: I-It's turned black!

name: Woman
dialog: B-But, why!?

name: Old Man
dialog: How the heck should I know! I-I'll go call the chief. I hope this isn't a bad omen... C-C-CHIEF...!

name: Serge
dialog: Heh heh heh heh... I've finally made it this far...

name: Serge
dialog: And now! The Frozen Flame is finally in my hands!

name: Serge
dialog: I shall become FATE...! Heh heh heh heh... Hah hah hah hah...!

name: Riddel
dialog: Attention!

name: Riddel
dialog: Good morning, everyone. Go~od mo~rni~ng, Miss Riddel!

name: Riddel
dialog: And now, a word from our headmaster.

name: Riddel
dialog: It's all yours, daddy.

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Are you sure this was what you wanted, sir?

name: Dario
dialog: Ahahaha! Look! The kids are bursting with joy! It's hard to believe we live in a barbarous world.

name: Dario
dialog: These are the kids that will shape the next generation. I am sure the general is in full agreement.

name: Dario
dialog: Isn't that right, sir?

name: Viper
dialog: Hmm? Well, ummm... Ahahahahaha!

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Shall we start a dragoon youth group, sir?

name: Dario
dialog: Ahahahahaha!

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Ahahahahaha!

name: Dario
dialog: We must keep it a secret from Riddel, though.

name: Dario
dialog: Ahahahahaha!

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: What do we do about the operating costs, sir?

name: Dario
dialog: No need to worry. I have an idea.

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Oh, you mean...

name: Dario
dialog: We must keep it a secret from Riddel, though.

name: Dario
dialog: Ahahahahaha!

name: Riddel
dialog: Hmm? What is it? What is so amusing?

name: Dario
dialog: Perhaps we can have Riddel work there, too...

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Are you serious, sir? I'll be a regular for sure!

name: Dario
dialog: Ahahahahaha!

name: Serge
dialog: Heh... Looks like this place will soon be a ghost town, too... I can't believe it was recently so full of life... Well, I guess I am responsible for all this... Heh heh heh... It's time we wreak some havoc.

name: Harle
dialog: Serge...!

name: Serge
dialog: What is it, Harle...?

name: Harle
dialog: All zis walking haz made moi fatigée. Pleaze, let'z rest somewhere.

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah, me too.

name: Serge
dialog: Heh... Fine. We're in no hurry. But I wonder if there's somewhere we can rest in this town...?

name: Harle
dialog: I t'ink zat bar may be open.

name: Serge
dialog: Aaaah...yes. It's hard to believe such a place would still be in business during these wretched times. Well, good for us, I suppose. We may also be able to gather some information...

name: Serge
dialog: Hmmm... Not too bad for a hole in the wall, don't you think?

name: Serge
dialog: Hey... Can someone see us to a table?

name: Luccia
dialog: Velcome to the Viper bar! Karsh, Marcy, see dat dey get the best table in the house.

name: Karsh
dialog: Right this way, my beautiful ladies...

name: Marcy
dialog: Hey, good-looking... Why don't you join me here...?

name: Karsh
dialog: May I take your order?

name: Serge
dialog: An ice-cold beer! On tap, of course!

name: Harle
dialog: Non, non, non! You are underage! You may be Lynx on ze inside, but you are still a 17 year old boy!

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah, I guess so... Don't you have any non-alchoholic specials?

name: Karsh
dialog: Then may I recommend our house special, 'Galaxy Night?' It is a mellow blend of bellflower and soda that is sure to quench the thirst.

name: Kid
dialog: Yeah, I'll have that one.

name: Harle
dialog: I'll have ze 'Denadoro Mountain Blend.' Oh, and make zat two cream, ten sugar.

name: Serge
dialog: Harle... A little heavy on the sugar, aren't you...?

name: Harle
dialog: It makez moi sweeter for you, mon chéri...!

name: Marcy
dialog: Hey, handsome... I'd like one of those 'Galaxy Nights,' too... Won't you buy me a drink?

name: Serge
dialog: Fine, make that one for her and one for me. That'll be all.

name: Karsh
dialog: Excellent choice, sir.

name: Karsh
dialog: 3 orders of our house special, 'Galaxy Night'... and one Denadoro Mountain Blend...two and ten!

name: Solt
dialog: Yes, sir!!!

name: Luccia
dialog: Velcome!

name: Luccia
dialog: Peppor, ve have some customers vaiting.

name: Peppor
dialog: I-I'm shakin' it!

name: Peppor
dialog: R-Right this way, please!

name: Peppor
dialog: M-May I shake your order?

name: Peppor
dialog: B-Box...? L-Liquid...? O-Ohh... So you wanna shake it and try all the drinks we have here? R-Right away!

name: Serge
dialog: Weirdos...

name: Harle
dialog: Who carez about ze ot'er customerz? Let'z have a toast!

name: Serge
dialog: Yeah... I guess so. Well then... To our glory! CHEERS!

name: Serge
dialog: I just wish this boy Serge was of legal drinking age...

name: Marcy
dialog: May I have another...?

name: Serge
dialog: What? You haven't even finished your drink yet...

name: Marcy
dialog: Oh, the ice all melted while we were having that reeeally nice conversation... I want an ice-cold one... Would that be alright...?

name: Serge
dialog: Fine...fine... Bring out one more Galaxy Night...

name: Kid
dialog: You guys wanna head out soon?

name: Harle
dialog: Oui! Will you be treating us, Serge?

name: Serge
dialog: Heh... Fine, fine... But just make sure you keep up the good work!

name: Harle
dialog: Oui, oui! Of course!

name: Serge
dialog: Alright, you guys wait for me outside.

name: Serge
dialog: Hey, bring me the check!

name: Karsh
dialog: Thank you very much, sir!

name: Luccia
dialog: Please pay at the counter.

name: Karsh
dialog: Ladies, I really enjoyed your company today... Please do stop by again. Here is my card.

name: Serge
dialog: Well, how much?

name: Luccia
dialog: Only dis much...

name: Serge
dialog: Let's see here... Whoa, we drank quite a bit... Huh? Looks like there's an extra 0 on the total there...

name: Luccia
dialog: No... Dis is the correct amount.

name: Serge
dialog: You gotta be out of your mind! I don't have that kind of cash on me!

name: Luccia
dialog: If you cannot pay, please step inside our consultation room next door.

name: Serge
dialog: You bet I will! You don't know who you're dealing with...!

name: Serge
dialog: Hey, this price is ridiculous! I'll sue you, you know! ......!?

name: Zoah
dialog: NO... YOU DO NOT KNOW WHO YOU ARE DEALING WITH.

name: Karsh
dialog: Gah hah hah hah... Easy money...

name: Marcy
dialog: Looks like we'll meet our quota for this month.

name: Karsh
dialog: Yeah... But still, all I wanna know is when we can start wreaking some havoc again! I'm not cut out for this kinda stuff!

name: Marcy
dialog: So you say, but I know you enjoy being the ladies' man...

name: Karsh
dialog: W-Whatever!

name: Harle
dialog: How many yearz haz it been since I last vizited...?

name: Harle
dialog: Sigh...

name: Harle
dialog: I wonder if theze flowerz will do...?

name: Kid
dialog: An ancient magical kingdom...? That you destroyed ten thousand years ago...? What are ya talkin' about?

name: Kid
dialog: Stop it... I don't know nothin'! I'm... I'm Kid!! I'm myself and nobody else!!

name: Norris
dialog: If I take this with me back to Porre, there will be even more bloodshed. And yet, it will give us enough power to withstand the other major countries. Is that all I have really desired this whole time...?

name: Nikki
dialog: Marvelous... It's a truly marvelous tone... It brings out light and darkness within me clearly!

name: Viper
dialog: Hmm... Good Lord! Is there nothing more to life than destroying and defeating one another after all...?

name: Viper
dialog: And only then shall living beings advance forward, to a higher level? The 'survival of the fittest?' Is that the true meaning of evolution?

name: Riddel
dialog: What an awfully sad light... As long as we are alive, it is impossible to avoid partings. If that is so, then perhaps it would be better if one did not meet others at all... Excuse me? No! It cannot be... Is it you...? It is you! Oh, I am so relieved. You were always by my side, and yet I never noticed...

name: Karsh
dialog: For crying out loud... Stop it! I know that already! Don't read my mind any further than that!

name: Zoah
dialog: HMPH! WHAT MEANING IS THERE TO A LIFE OF STRIVING AFTER WEALTH AND POWER...? IT IS NO USE TO YOU ONCE YOU DIE! AS FOR ME, I CHOOSE TO LIVE IN BATTLE AND ONE DAY TO DIE IN BATTLE.

name: Marcy
dialog: What? Oh, I already knew that... I know that half of the blood within me is that of a demi-human... And I know that it'll be easier for me if I can accept that fact... What are you, my school counselor or something? Like, tell me something I don't know...

name: Korcha
dialog: HotCHACHA! This is greatCHA! It feels like firecrackers are going off in my head.

name: Korcha
dialog: I getCHA... I understand it now! All living things are really connected in their hearts! There's nothing to worry about.

name: Luccia
dialog: Ack! Vot power... Dis power is not somet'ing man should possess. yes...it is just as I t'ought. Several civilizations have already been destroyed because of dis immense power... As you said, my friend... Science should only be used for the betterhood of mankind, no!?

name: Poshul
dialog: Why can't we all be friendth? Ith that tho hard to do?

name: Poshul
dialog: Watch out. Me won't lose againtht any big, bad, ugry enemy!

name: Zappa
dialog: Aye... These auld bones have seen countless faces of the flame in mah lifetime... But with this un, ah cannae say ah've ever seen more pure and genuine hatred...

name: Radius
dialog: Ooh... With this power, even an old knight like me could... No! This is the same as what happened before, with the hatred of the Masamune. Oh, Garai...forgive me! I almost made the same grave mistake. What was that...? You say it is behind us now? Is that you, Garai...? Have you forgiven me...?

name: Fargo
dialog: Ha ha ha!! Arrgh, what are you trying to tell me, Flame? You say that we are all born in sin and all die in sin? Well, I say that is why we should continue to sin, then.... Ha ha ha ha ha! Yet, is not the very reason we go on living so that we can make ammends for our sins!?

name: Macha
dialog: Why can't we all just be happy for once? If only we could all hold hands and live together in peace and harmony? Why can't people understand this...?

name: Glenn
dialog: You have no right to say such a thing! I am my own person! I will choose my own destiny with my own strength...

name: Leena
dialog: Yes... Yes... I know that what you say may be true.

name: Leena
dialog: But it is because we have such a petty and short life... ...that we all live life to the fullest, for all it's worth! No one, including you -- whoever you are -- has the right to take that away from us...

name: Starky
dialog: Woowzer! Out of this world...! The liight of the big baang! All starts from heere and all ends heere... What liies beeyond that...?

name: Van
dialog: Mom...!? Is that you I see, Mom!? No, you aren't her! You're just showing me what you think I want to see!

name: Sneff
dialog: Yes. I know my liffe is ffull off mistakes. But I didn't know back then what I know now, so I have no regrets!

name: Steena
dialog: This is... divine power! I see... In order to save the many, the few have to be sacrificed... That is the truth...!? It makes us seem oh-so-powerless...! That is the reason why we must live shoulder-to-shoulder and hand-in-hand!

name: Doc
dialog: Humans are, like, totally powerless, dude! With crafty knowledge we may extend our lives a fraction, but we just extend our suffering, too. But in reality, all we can do is leave ourselves in nature's hands and die the way nature intends us to... That is the awesome truth!? Gnarly!

name: Pierre
dialog: I understand now! A true hero knows fear... And yet while knowing fear, he still has the courage to put up a fight! If moi lack the caliber to be called such then moi will just have to work harder!

name: Norris
dialog: You work to be more honest more straight... This world is distorted and crooked. Trying to force your honesty on this crooked world may break you. Beware of that.

name: Nikki
dialog: The reading states that you are a bridge that connects to the other side.

name: Nikki
dialog: A bridge...?

name: Viper
dialog: You will continue to be the rightful lord that you are...

name: Viper
dialog: But I...

name: Riddel
dialog: Deep devotion often makes the impossible possible. I suggest that you keep holding on to your purity.

name: Riddel
dialog: Yes...

name: Karsh
dialog: What the...?

name: Zoah
dialog: I sense deep sadness beneath that mask of yours... In the near future, you, too, shall find your sanctuary of peace...

name: Marcy
dialog: The reading says, your wish will come true if you purge of your likes and dislikes...

name: Korcha
dialog: Your fortune reads, that it is a hopeless love... I'm sorry, but you've got to give up.

name: Korcha
dialog: Arrgh!!! Don't give me such boloney!

name: Luccia
dialog: You shall always be under the watchful eye of your former master...

name: Poshul
dialog: Beware of fat and of over-eating... Well, I guess that goes without saying.

name: Poshul
dialog: PO-SHU-SHU!!!

name: Zappa
dialog: You shall encounter the two things you seek... But be careful, for one of them is what you seek only in appearance.

name: Radius
dialog: The many lines laid before you, shall all merge into one...

name: Fargo
dialog: Take away the mirror of falsity and reflect your image on the mirror of truth. You will then regain your true self.

name: Macha
dialog: It reads that, as a mother, you should set an example for your children.

name: Glenn
dialog: If I were to equate you to something, you would be the moon.

name: Glenn
dialog: Moon...?

name: Leena
dialog: It says, you will not find a boyfriend for a long time. Fortunetelling is such a merciless thing...

name: Leena
dialog: How rude!

name: Harle
dialog: In your eyes, I perceive... both the look of a beauty and the look of a beast. Be mindful not to bring about your own end. The truth is beginning to reach out to engulf you.

name: Starky
dialog: My word! You are fated to make a grave choice. Whatever will be selected will be decided from the actions of those around you.

name: Van
dialog: Take good care of the ones who love you, my boy.

name: Van
dialog: Humph!

name: Sneff
dialog: You shall once again open your wings in the free world, says the fortune.

name: Steena
dialog: Hmph, it's useless for a spiritualist to have their fortune read.

name: Doc
dialog: Do not linger on your mistakes in the past. Humans must always look to the future...

name: Pierre
dialog: There are such things as major comebacks in this world... It's all about luck and having everything turn around when things are at their worst. You have that potential in you.

name: System
dialog: Received Janice's What'sUpDoc!

name: System
dialog: The time will come for the doorway to open.

name: Member
dialog: Looks like the Dragon doesn't exist in this world.

name: Member
dialog: But Member... What's that thing on the ledge up there? I don't think we've ever seen a monster like that before...

name: Member
dialog: It's coming down!

name: Kid
dialog: Great! That decides it then! We're real good mates now!

name: Kid
dialog: Oh, and Serge. Don't go tryin' any funny stuff just cuz I'm cute'n all!

name: Kid
dialog: Sheeze! Well, have it yer way, mate!

name: Poshul
dialog: PO-SHU-SHU!

name: Poshul

dialog: I'm very sorry, but I'm forbidden to talk to passengers...

name: Man
dialog: Tch! Nikki this and Nikki that! That's all I hear on this ship! What's the big deal anyway!? Look at the way he dresses... And he wears makeup, too! A man has to be tough! Be a man, I say!

name: Woman
dialog: Oh...Nikki... Just looking at your poster makes my head spin... If I see you in person, I will probably faint... If that should happen, please, Nikki...! Squeeze me in your arms!

name: Woman
dialog: I wish Nikki's concert would start soon... It took me 6 months to save enough money for this event. I had to sacrifice my daily coffee breaks. But it'll be all worth it when I see Nikki in person!

name: Solt
dialog: What is wrongly wrong with this cat?

name: Peppor
dialog: What's shakin' with this cat?

name: Peppor
dialog: H-He shook what he deserved.

name: Solt
dialog: Old man Sneff would always mockingly mock our comedy act! That is why something awfully awful happened to him!

name: Peppor
dialog: Th-This time I get the punch line!

name: Solt
dialog: This time, I get to say the punch line! Hiya! That hurts! You're misunderstandin' 'punch' line!

name: Man
dialog: Tough break, man... He couldn't change you back, huh? I told you to watch out for that man!

name: Woman
dialog: Oh no! He couldn't change you back? Don't worry. I'm sure there's some kind of trick behind it...

name: Woman
dialog: Oh, what a cute little kitty-cat... Sigh... If I were a kitty-cat, I would sneak into Nikki's room and curl up on his lap...

name: Man
dialog: Huh!? I got nothin' to feed to you felines!

name: Man
dialog: Zzzz... Zzzz...

name: Woman
dialog: If only I were a cat, I'd be able to walk across that rope into Nikki's room... But not with my weight...

name: Woman
dialog: Yeah! Finish him!!!

name: Man
dialog: Nooo! C'mon, what are you doin'!? I have everything riding on you!!!

name: Man
dialog: Why does my monster always lose? Am I not feeding it right? Not enough tender loving care...?

name: Woman
dialog: Ooooh... I can't get enough of those ferocious claws... The cry of victory makes me tingle!

name: Man
dialog: OHHH YEAHHH! Give it to me, baby! U-hah, u-hah!!!

name: Man
dialog: Right on! Jab! Hook! Punch!!! You can do it!!!

name: Man
dialog: They're all taking refuge at the village chief's. I've been told not to let outsiders through. It'd be the end of us if one of Serge's minions were to make its way in.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I have orders not to let anyone through.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: This manor is now occupied by the Porre military.

name: System
dialog: It appears to have been made to hold something. It seems that you cannot do it yet.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris, thank you for your trouble, sir. Everything is under control, sir. Hey, don't wander around here. You are interfering with my duties.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Why Commander Norris. Thank you for your trouble. Currently, we have suspended all economic activities in Termina. We have left only the Element Shop alone, but that smith is a stubborn one... He will not close shop for anything. Of course, the bar over there has been shut down as well. We're pretty thorough when we need to be, you know. Not that anyone would want to go drinking in a time like this, but just in case.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris, all is well, sir! Don't bother me.

name: Man
dialog: Sir Lynx! Please stop that kid Serge! He looks like this! We're counting on you, sir!

name: Man
dialog: Arrgh, shoot! I gotta close shop before I've even sold anything!? What rotten luck! Just when I thought business was coming along... The Porre guys storm in, a kid named Serge attacks... it's a mess!

name: Woman
dialog: Don't bother me, alright? Gotta hurry and clean up! I've got no time to waste around here!

name: Man
dialog: Just when I got all setup, I had to close up shop. Gosh, what's going on around here?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: There are no suspicious ships, sir! I'm on watch for any suspicious ships.

name: Girl
dialog: John... You are the most wonderful hero...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: These demi-humans are good workers. They really impressed me. Don't you be wandering around here.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: No suspicious ships to report, sir! Don't bother me.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: All is well, sir. Too bad we couldn't see the famed Viper Festival. No trespassing.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: The inn gets many visitors coming into town. We are here checking for anyone suspicious.

name: Girl
dialog: Kein! What are you doing here?

name: Girl
dialog: Were you the one who brought me the Drakehorn grass...?

name: Girl
dialog: But why...?

name: Girl
dialog: Kein... Thank you. But even if I get well, I don't know if we'll ever play outside with the Porre soldiers out there.

name: Girl
dialog: OK! I'll practice my jump rope, too!

name: Girl
dialog: Uh-huh!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: The place was deserted by the time we arrived.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: General Viper and the 4 Devas have gone to Fort Dragonia. I have no further information.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I kept the old dragon stable keeper to look after the dragons.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I chased off the remaining dragoons, but some were imprisoned.

name: System
dialog: Go down? ~~~Yes ~~~No

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: That over there is our ultimate weapon, Guillot. There's NO WAY you can defeat that thing.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Looks like the Viper Manor gang left in fear of our men.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I came here looking for a fight, but with no one here, what's the point?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I reckon there's a secret room around here somewhere... Whoa! So that's how you open it.

name: System
dialog: There's a note inside the drawer. ~~~Read it ~~~Don't read it Fear the one with the Missing shield... Repress the anger Of thy god... The moment you see truth From within the light... The god's anger will calm... There's something written on the back. Check the pillar in the armory!!!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: A living flower... I hope it's not carnivorous. This flower... Seems to be a living creature... The flower... I-It's alive...! Hey? Where did that flower go?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: It's been 100 years since people first inhabited El Nido... A lot has changed, but the sea remains the same.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris had another disagreement with his superiors and has been sent to the parlor on the other side.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Nice and firm... But a bit smelly...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I was convinced the Frozen Flame would be here, but I was wrong.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris disguised himself as a dishwasher to conduct espionage.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: What the hell's takin' so long? Where's my food? That's the problem with El Nido people. They're too lazy!

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Luccia used to work in a lab up in Porre. But she lost her brother in a freak accident during his experiments. She wanted to get away from it all, so she made her way down to El Nido. Our Grobyc is a killing machine being developed at that time.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I kinda feel bad for Orcha. He doesn't know he's being used.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Whoa! Did you see that!? The cook, Orcha, just transformed into Hell's Cook! He probably has another dirty job to take care of...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris is a little too soft. I wish he'd just crack down on those El Nido hicks.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: My orders are to investigate the sewer system. You can access the sewer system through a hatch in the hallway, but the current's too fast to actually set foot in the sewer. There's a valve that shuts off the water current, but the bridge leading to it is broken.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I tried to wake him up, but he won't budge. Well, he's useless anyway.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Under investigation, sir. I am sorry, Sir Lynx, but I cannot allow even you to pass.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Whoa! I didn't know you could get in from there!

name: System
dialog: Looks like you can push it.

name: System
dialog: There seems to be some trick to opening it. There's a valve. ~~~Tighten it ~~~Open it ~~~Leave it alone It won't tighten anymore. It won't open any further. 'Water Gate' ~~~Read instructions ~~~Look at water gate ~~~Quit The valve is connected to the water gate. Open the valve to open the gate, and tighten it to close the gate.

name: Man
dialog: Hey, man! Open up! Huh? Let me outta here! What the...? I'm innocent, I say! Hmm?

name: System
dialog: No one's there...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: How did I end up in here!?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Errrr... Didn't expect they'd come from behind me...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris! I thought you were inside. What is to become of us?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Please exit through the gate.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander! Is the meeting over? Please, by all means... Go on through, sir!

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: Come back soon, everyone... Zzzz... Zzzz...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander, will you be leaving? Sir Lynx, will you be leaving?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander! Where are you going?

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: I'm not sure it was a good idea to come with these people. Well, at least they know how to make a quick getaway. That's what saved me.

name: System
dialog: Jump in the big hole? ~~~Go for it! ~~~Nah, too dangerous

name: Man
dialog: I'm gettin' kinda bored of having nothing to do... I never knew being bored could be so boring. I wish Nikki's concert would start soon... Or else I'll die of boredom!

name: Man
dialog: Where did that demi- human waitress go? I'm thirsty as hell!

name: Man
dialog: I was really blown away by Nikki's performance... He's a genius... No, that still doesn't give him enough credit. He must have gone through a lot in life to come up with a performance like that...

name: Woman
dialog: Oh...Nikki... That was a beautiful performance... You moved me to tears...!

name: Woman
dialog: Nikki's concert was more like a broadway musical this time. It was wonderful... How does he come up with these ideas!? Well, I'll be able to enjoy my daily latte now!

name: Woman
dialog: The long-awaited Nikki concert is over... It felt like an eternity waiting for the concert to start, but once it started, it ended before I knew it. There was something bothering Nikki, though... He looked a little sad... but that really brought out his charm! Anyway, now that the concert's over, how am I going to fill this void in my life? Ohh, Nikki...! Marry me!!!

name: Man
dialog: Have you guys been to an island called Marbule? It used to be a beautiful island where mermaids lived. But now, it's infested by nasty-lookin' monsters. That island will never be the same...

name: Woman
dialog: Hey! You're my ultimate rival, Miki! Listen, YOU! You stay away from my Nikki, or you'll be sorry! OH MY GAWD!!! Nikki!!!!!!

name: Man
dialog: Move it! Move it! Oh, my achin' back...

name: Man
dialog: Yeah... I guess this will do.

name: Acacia Dragoon
dialog: How's this...?

name: System
dialog: ~~- NO ENTRY -~~ The interior is still under construction.

name: Man
dialog: Hold that for me, will ya?

name: Girl
dialog: Some swings would be nice, too. Please, Headmaster!?

name: Man
dialog: Darn... We need more manpower.

name: System
dialog: Go down into the sand boil? ~~~Yes ~~~No

name: System
dialog: Push it towards the sand jet to stop the flow.

name: System
dialog: Push it towards the cliff to stop the sand jet.

name: Woman
dialog: Will that man ever return...? I shall wait...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: We have orders not to let anyone through. But I believe we will be withdrawing soon.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: We haven't received official word, but there seems to have been some trouble inside.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander!? When did you get out?

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: This place is closed down.

name: Man
dialog: Y-You are...! Gosh, I was really surprised to hear about what happened to you. Although you might have some hard times, don't give up! I'll be rooting for you. Oh yeah, I'm closing up shop today, so go ahead and take any of the leftovers. That'll cheer you up! You've received some Viper Churros... They taste better than usual... You feel revitalized! There was something hard inside it... When you look at it closer, you found Rainbow!!!

name: Man
dialog: Serge...!? ...But you're not the same person who was attacking the town earlier... That guy had cold, sinister eyes, as if he hated everything in the world...

name: System
dialog: Would you like to rest? ~~~Yes ~~~No

name: System
dialog: Serge received a package for Irenes.

name: Man
dialog: Did you hear!? This time, Sky Dragon Isle has floated up into the sky! What the hell is goin' on!? What's gonna happen to us...?

name: Man
dialog: Like I told you, they're all taking shelter at the village chief's. I can't let outsiders through. Who knows how long we'll be in this situation? If I were you, I'd try to find a safe place to hide.

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: I saw a mysterious light somewhere out at sea! But I could not confirm what was going on... I saw a mysterious light out at sea... But it's too far away to see what's going on...

name: Porre Soldier
dialog: Commander Norris! Can you tell us what's going on around here? I don't think high command ever anticipated such a situation...! We are not able to conduct any action without orders from high command... Nonetheless, I sense that a very irregular occurence is happening here...

name: System
dialog: The door won't open.

name: Man
dialog: If we don't pick up the pace, we'll be stuck in the dark. Maybe I should just hire a new worker in town.

name: Girl
dialog: Welcome traveler! I will trade you materials for your extra Elements here. ~~~Trade ~~~Thanks, maybe later ...Oh, that's too bad. We have many kinds of materials you might be interested in. Thank you so much! If you get more unwanted Elements, please come again!

name: Man
dialog: That must be the 'Terra Tower' that the folk legends referred to... I never thought I would ever see such a legendary tower in my life...

name: Girl
dialog: That's far out... The isle's floating in air! I wonder what's going to happen? How exciting!

name: Girl
dialog: Everyone's going crazy right now! Believe it or not, right after the big earthquake, Sky Dragon Isle flew up into the air! Isn't that absolutely wild!? Unbelievable!!!

name: Woman
dialog: Truly unbelievable... The Sky Dragon Isle just lifted off the ground! What has caused this catastrophe?

name: Woman
dialog: I don't care if you're the village chief or what. Back of the line!

name: Girl
dialog: Please, Chief... Don't push...

name: Man
dialog: Ah, excuse me Chief, but I was here first.

name: Woman
dialog: With such a bizarre thing occuring, like the Sky Dragon's island floating in the sky, I'm afraid of what's going to happen next... All that I hope for is a world where my children can live worry-free.
